original: tasmād atra tu yāvatāsty upakṛtis tāvan mayā gṛhyate pāthodaiḥ paripīyate kim akhilaṃ tad vāri vārāṃ nidheḥ // Rajni_Gpr.6

analyzed: vīryeṇa kvacid itara āhvaya ādi deśāt dravyāṇām dhruvam iti saptadhā uditāni
atra auṣadhī nivaha nāma guṇa abhidhāna prastāvataḥ tad upayukta tayā itarāṇi

original: ekaḥ ko 'pi sacetasāṃ yadi mude kalpeta jalpe guṇas tatrānye 'pi vinārthanāṃ bahumatiṃ santaḥ svayaṃ tanvate /

original: atrānūpādir asmād avanir atha guḍūcīśatāhvādiko dvau tatprānte parpaṭādis tadupari paṭhitau pippalīmūlakādiḥ /
analyzed: atrā anūpa ādiḥ asmāt avaniḥ atha guḍūcī śatāhvā ādikaḥ dvau tad prānte parpaṭa ādiḥ tad upari paṭhitau pippalī mūlaka ādiḥ

original: śālmalyādiḥ prabhadrādikam anu karavīrādir āmrādir anyas tasyāgre candanādis tadanu nigaditaḥ komalaḥ kāñcanādiḥ // Rajni_Gpr.16

original: pānīyaḥ kṣīraśālyādikam anu kathito māsamānuṣyakādiḥ siṃhādiḥ syād gadādis tadanu bhavati sattvādhiko miśrako 'nyaḥ /

original: ekārthādis tad etais trikaraparicitaiḥ prātibhonmeṣasargaṃ vargair āsādya vaidyo nijamatahṛdaye nistarāṃ niścinotu // Rajni_Gpr.17

original: seyaṃ śrīnarasiṃhanāmaviduṣo svarvaidyavidyāsthitiḥ prītyā prāptasuvarṇarājiracanā citrojjvalā pīṭhikā // Rajni_Gpr.18

ānūpa ādi varga

original: nānākṣauṇījanānājalamṛgasahitaṃ nirjharavrātaśītaṃ śailākīrṇaṃ kanīyaḥ kuraramukhakhagālaṅkṛtaṃ tāmrabhūmi /

original: bibhrad vrīhyādikaṃ yat sthalam ativipulaṃ nīrasaṃ yat tv anuṣṇaṃ pittaghnaṃ śleṣmavātapradam udararujāpāmadaṃ syād anūpam // Rajni_1.1
analyzed: bibhrat vrīhi ādikam yat sthalam ati vipulam nīrasam yat tu anuṣṇam pitta ghnam śleṣma vāta pradam udara rujā pāma dam syāt anūpam
tat ca ukta kṛtsna nija lakṣaṇa dhāri bhūri chāyā āvṛta antara vahat bahu vāri mukhyam

original: īṣat prakāśasalilaṃ yadi madhyamaṃ tat etac ca nātibahalāmbu bhavet kanīyaḥ // Rajni_1.2

original: yatrānūpaviparyayas tanutṛṇāstīrṇā dharā dhūsarā mudgavrīhiyavādidhānyaphaladā tīvroṣmavaty uttamā /
analyzed: yatra ānūpa viparyayaḥ tanu tṛṇa āstīrṇā dharā dhūsarā mudga vrīhi yava ādi dhānya phala dā tīvra uṣmavatī uttamā

original: prāyaḥ pittavivṛddhir uddhatabalāḥ syur nīrajaḥ prāṇino gāvo 'jāś ca payaḥ kṣaranti bahu tatkūpe jalaṃ jāṅgalam // Rajni_1.3
analyzed: prāyas pitta vivṛddhiḥ uddhata balāḥ syuḥ nīrajaḥ prāṇinaḥ gāvaḥ jāḥ ca payaḥ kṣaranti bahu tad kūpe jalam jāṅgalam

original: etac ca mukhyam uditaṃ svaguṇaiḥ samagram alpālpabhūruhayutaṃ yadi madhyamaṃ tat /
analyzed: etat ca mukhyam uditam sva guṇaiḥ samagram alpa alpa bhūruha yutam yadi madhyamam tat

original: tac cāpi kūpakhanane sulabhāmbu yat taj jñeyaṃ kanīya iti jāṅgalakaṃ trirūpam // Rajni_1.4
analyzed: tat ca api kūpa khanane sulabha ambu yat tat jñeyam kanīyaḥ iti jāṅgalakam trirūpam

original: lakṣmonmīlati yatra kiṃcid ubhayos taj jāṅgalānūpayor godhūmolvaṇayāvanālavilasanmāṣādidhānyodbhavaḥ /

original: nānāvarṇam aśeṣajantusukhadaṃ deśaṃ budhā madhyamaṃ doṣodbhūtivikopaśāntisahitaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ taṃ viduḥ // Rajni_1.5
analyzed: nānā varṇam aśeṣa jantu sukha dam deśam budhāḥ madhyamam doṣa udbhūti vikopa śānti sahitam sādhāraṇam tam viduḥ  /
tat ca sādhāraṇam dvedhā ānūpa jāṅgalayoḥ param

original: yatra yatra guṇādhikyaṃ tatra tasya guṇaṃ bhajet // Rajni_1.6
analyzed: yatra yatra guṇa ādhikyam tatra tasya guṇam bhajet

original: sūkṣmatvāl lakṣma tattvasya tadvidhair vedam iṣyate // Rajni_1.7
analyzed: sūkṣma tvāt lakṣma tattvasya tadvidhaiḥ vā idam iṣyate
kṣetra bhedam pravakṣyāmi śivena ākhyātam añjasā

original: brāhmaṃ kṣātraṃ ca vaiśyīyaṃ śaudraṃ ceti yathākramāt // Rajni_1.8
analyzed: brāhmam kṣātram ca vaiśyīyam śaudram ca iti yathākramāt

original: tatra kṣetre brahmabhūmīruhāḍhyaṃ vārisphāraṃ yat kuśāṅkūrakīrṇam /
analyzed: tatra kṣetre brahma bhūmīruha āḍhyam vāri sphāram yat kuśa aṅkūra kīrṇam

original: ramyaṃ yac ca śvetamṛtsnāsametaṃ tad vyācaṣṭe brāhmam ity aṣṭamūrtiḥ // Rajni_1.9
analyzed: ramyam yat ca śveta mṛtsnā sametam tat vyācaṣṭe brāhmam iti aṣṭamūrtiḥ

original: ghoraghoṣi khadirādidurgamaṃ kṣātram etad uditaṃ pinākinā // Rajni_1.10
analyzed: ghora ghoṣi khadira ādi durgamam kṣātram etat uditam pinākinā
śātakumbha nibha bhūmi bhāsvaram svarṇa reṇu nicitam vidhāna vat

original: siddhakiṃnarasuparvasevitaṃ vaiśyam ākhyad idam induśekharaḥ // Rajni_1.11
analyzed: siddha kiṃnara suparva sevitam vaiśyam ākhyat idam induśekharaḥ
śyāma sthala āḍhyam bahu śasya bhūti dam lasat tṛṇaiḥ babbula vṛkṣa vṛddhi dam

original: dhānyodbhavaiḥ karṣakalokaharṣadaṃ jagāda śaudraṃ jagatau vṛṣadhvajaḥ // Rajni_1.12
analyzed: dhānya udbhavaiḥ karṣaka loka harṣa dam jagāda śaudram jagatau vṛṣadhvajaḥ

original: dravyaṃ kṣetrād uditam anaghaṃ brāhma tat siddhidāyi kṣatrād utthaṃ valipalitajid viśvarogāpahāri /
analyzed: dravyam kṣetrāt uditam anagham brāhma tat siddhi dāyi kṣatrāt uttham vali palita jit viśva roga apahāri

original: vaiśyāj jātaṃ prabhavatitarāṃ dhātulohādisiddhau śaudrād etaj janitam akhilavyādhividrāvakaṃ drāk // Rajni_1.13
analyzed: vaiśyāt jātam prabhavatitarām dhātu loha ādi siddhau śaudrāt etat janitam akhila vyādhi vidrāvakam drāk

original: brahmā śakraḥ kiṃnareśas tathā bhūr ity eteṣāṃ devatāḥ syuḥ krameṇa /
analyzed: brahmā śakraḥ kiṃnareśaḥ tathā bhūḥ iti eteṣām devatāḥ syuḥ krameṇa

original: proktās tatra prāg umāvallabhena pratyekaṃ te pañca bhūtāni vakṣye // Rajni_1.14
analyzed: proktāḥ tatra prāk umāvallabhena pratyekam te pañca bhūtāni vakṣye
pīta sphurat valaya śarkarila aśma ramyam pītam yat uttama mṛgam caturasra bhūtam

original: prāyaś ca pītakusumānvitavīrudādi tat pārthivaṃ kaṭhinam udyad aśeṣatas tu // Rajni_1.15
analyzed: prāyas ca pīta kusuma anvita vīrudh ādi tat pārthivam kaṭhinam udyat aśeṣatas tu
ardhacandra ākṛti śvetam kamala ābham dṛṣad citam

original: nadīnadajalākīrṇam āpyaṃ tat kṣetram ucyate // Rajni_1.16
analyzed: nadīnada jala ākīrṇam āpyam tat kṣetram ucyate

original: trikoṇaṃ raktapāṣāṇaṃ kṣetraṃ taijasam uttamam // Rajni_1.17
analyzed: tri koṇam rakta pāṣāṇam kṣetram taijasam uttamam

original: śākais tṛṇair añcitarūkṣavṛkṣakaṃ prakāram etat khalu vāyavīyam // Rajni_1.18
analyzed: śākaiḥ tṛṇaiḥ añcita rūkṣa vṛkṣakam prakāram etat khalu vāyavīyam

original: nānāvarṇaṃ vartulaṃ tat praśastaṃ prāyaḥ śubhraṃ parvatākīrṇam uccaiḥ /
analyzed: nānā varṇam vartulam tat praśastam prāyas śubhram parvata ākīrṇam uccais

original: yac ca sthānaṃ pāvanaṃ devatānāṃ prāha kṣetraṃ trīkṣaṇas tv āntarikṣam // Rajni_1.19
analyzed: yat ca sthānam pāvanam devatānām prāha kṣetram trīkṣaṇaḥ tu āntarikṣam

original: dravyaṃ vyādhiharaṃ balātiśayakṛt svādu sthiraṃ pārthivaṃ syād āpyaṃ kaṭukaṃ kaṣāyam akhilaṃ śītaṃ ca pittāpaham /
analyzed: dravyam vyādhi haram bala atiśaya kṛt svādu sthiram pārthivam syāt āpyam kaṭukam kaṣāyam akhilam śītam ca pitta apaham

original: yat tiktaṃ lavaṇaṃ ca dīpyamarujic coṣṇaṃ ca tat taijasaṃ vāyavyaṃ tu himoṣṇam amlam abalaṃ syān nābhasaṃ nīrasam // Rajni_1.20
analyzed: yat tiktam lavaṇam ca dīpya maru jit ca uṣṇam ca tat taijasam vāyavyam tu hima uṣṇam amlam abalam syāt nābhasam nīrasam

original: brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudro 'smād īśvaro 'tha sadāśivaḥ /
analyzed: brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca smāt sadāśivaḥ

original: ity etāḥ kamataḥ pañca kṣetrabhūtādhidevatāḥ // Rajni_1.21
analyzed: iti etāḥ kamataḥ pañca kṣetra bhūta adhidevatāḥ

original: jitvā javād ajarasainyam ihājahāra vīraḥ purā yudhi sudhākalaśaṃ garutmān /
analyzed: jitvā javāt ajara sainyam iha ājahāra vīraḥ purā yudhi sudhā kalaśam garutmān

original: kīrṇais tadā bhuvi sudhāśakalaiḥ kilāsīd vṛkṣādikaṃ sakalam asya sudhāṃśur īśaḥ // Rajni_1.22
analyzed: kīrṇaiḥ tadā bhuvi sudhā śakalaiḥ kila āsīt vṛkṣa ādikam sakalam asya sudhāṃśuḥ īśaḥ  /

original: tatrotpannās tūttame kṣetrabhāge viprīyādau vipruṣo yatra yatra /
analyzed: tatra utpannāḥ tu uttame kṣetra bhāge vipruṣaḥ yatra yatra

original: kṣauṇījādidravyabhūyaṃ prapannās tās tāḥ saṃjñā bibhrate tatra bhūyaḥ // Rajni_1.23
analyzed: kṣauṇīja ādi dravya bhūyam prapannāḥ tāḥ tāḥ saṃjñāḥ bibhrate tatra bhūyas
evam kṣetra ānuguṇyena tad jāḥ vipra ādi varṇinaḥ

original: yadi vā lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyāmy amohāya manīṣiṇām // Rajni_1.24
analyzed: yadi vā lakṣaṇam vakṣyāmi amohāya manīṣiṇām

original: kisalayakusume prakāṇḍaśākhādiṣu viśadeṣu vadanti vipram etān /
analyzed: kisalaya kusume prakāṇḍa śākhā ādiṣu viśadeṣu vadanti vipram etān

original: narapatimatilohiteṣu vaiśyaṃ kanakanibheṣu sitetareṣu śūdram // Rajni_1.25
analyzed: narapatim ati lohiteṣu vaiśyam kanaka nibheṣu sitetareṣu śūdram
vipra ādi jāti sambhūtān vipra ādiṣu eva yojayet

original: guṇāḍhyān api vṛkṣādīn prātilomyaṃ na cācaret // Rajni_1.26
analyzed: guṇa āḍhyān api vṛkṣa ādīn prātilomyam na ca ācaret

original: vipro viprādyeṣu varṇeṣu rājā rājanyādau vaiśyamukhyeṣu vaiśyaḥ /
analyzed: vipraḥ vipra ādyeṣu varṇeṣu rājā rājani ādau vaiśya mukhyeṣu vaiśyaḥ

original: śūdraḥ śūdrādyeṣu śastaṃ guṇāḍhyaṃ dravyaṃ naiva prātilomyena kiṃcit // Rajni_1.27
analyzed: śūdraḥ śūdra ādyeṣu śastam guṇa āḍhyam dravyam na eva prātilomyena kiṃcid

original: dravyaṃ yad aṅkūrajam āhur āryās tat te punaḥ pañcavidhaṃ vadanti /
analyzed: dravyam yat aṅkūra jam āhuḥ āryāḥ tat te punar pañcavidham vadanti

original: vanaspatiś cāpi sa eva vānaspatyaḥ kṣupo vīrud athauṣadhīś ca // Rajni_1.28
analyzed: vanaspatiḥ ca api saḥ eva vānaspatyaḥ kṣupaḥ vīrudh atha auṣadhīḥ ca

original: jñeyaḥ so 'tra vanaspatiḥ phalati yaḥ puṣpair vinā taiḥ phalaṃ vānaspatya iti smṛtas tanur asau hrasvaḥ kṣupaḥ kathyate /
analyzed: jñeyaḥ saḥ tra vanaspatiḥ phalati yaḥ puṣpaiḥ vinā taiḥ phalam vānaspatyaḥ iti smṛtaḥ tanuḥ asau hrasvaḥ kṣupaḥ kathyate

original: yā vellatyagamādisaṃśrayavaśād eṣā tu vallī matā śālyādiḥ punar oṣadhiḥ phalaparīpākāvasānānvitā // Rajni_1.29
analyzed: yā vellati agama ādi saṃśraya vaśāt eṣā tu vallī matā śāli ādiḥ punar oṣadhiḥ phala parīpāka avasāna anvitā
strī pum napuṃsaka tvena traividhyam sthāvareṣu api

original: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tallakṣma vyaktam atra yathākramam // Rajni_1.30
analyzed: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tat lakṣma vyaktam atra yathākramam
ikṣu veṇu taru vīrudh ādayaḥ skandha kāṇḍa phala puṣpa pallavaiḥ

original: snigdhadīrghatanutāmanoramās tāḥ striyaḥ khalu matā vipaścitām // Rajni_1.31
analyzed: snigdha dīrgha tanu tā manoramāḥ tāḥ striyaḥ khalu matāḥ vipaścitām
yatra puṣpa pravāla ādi na ati dīrgham na ca alpakam

original: sthūlaṃ paruṣam ity eṣa pumān ukto manīṣibhiḥ // Rajni_1.32
analyzed: sthūlam paruṣam iti eṣa pumān uktaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: strīpuṃsayor yatra vibhāti lakṣma dvayor api skandhaphalādikeṣu /
analyzed: strīpuṃsayoḥ yatra vibhāti lakṣma dvayoḥ api skandha phala ādikeṣu

original: saṃdehadaṃ naikatarāvadhāri napuṃsakaṃ tadvibudhā vadanti // Rajni_1.33
analyzed: saṃdeha dam na ekatara avadhāri napuṃsakam tat vibudhāḥ vadanti

original: dravyaṃ pumān syād akhilasya jantor ārogyadaṃ tadbalavardhanaṃ ca /
analyzed: dravyam pumān syāt akhilasya jantoḥ ārogya dam tad bala vardhanam ca

original: strī durbalā svalpaguṇā guṇāḍhyā strīṣv eva na kvāpi napuṃsakaḥ syāt // Rajni_1.34
analyzed: strī durbalā su alpa guṇā guṇa āḍhyā strīṣu eva na kva api napuṃsakaḥ syāt

original: yadi striyaḥ strīṣu kṛtā guṇāḍhyāḥ klībāni tu klībaśarīrabhājām /
analyzed: yadi striyaḥ strīṣu kṛtāḥ guṇa āḍhyāḥ klībāni tu klība śarīra bhājām

original: sadā ca sarvatra pumān prayuktau guṇāvahaś ceti ca kecid āhuḥ // Rajni_1.35
analyzed: sadā ca sarvatra pumān prayuktau guṇa āvahaḥ ca iti ca kecid āhuḥ

original: kṣutpipāsā ca nidrā ca vṛkṣādiṣv api lakṣyate /
analyzed: kṣudh pipāsā ca nidrā ca vṛkṣa ādiṣu api lakṣyate
mṛd jala ādānataḥ tu ādye parṇa saṃkocita antimā

original: yatkāṭhinye sā kṣitiryodbhavo 'mbhastejastūṣmā vardhate yat sa vātaḥ /
analyzed: yat kāṭhinye sā kṣitiḥ yā udbhavaḥ mbhaḥ tejaḥ tu ūṣmā vardhate yat sa vātaḥ

original: yad yac chidraṃ tan nabhaḥ sthāvarāṇām ity eteṣāṃ pañcabhūtātmakatvam // Rajni_1.37
analyzed: yat yat chidram tat nabhaḥ sthāvarāṇām iti eteṣām pañcabhūta ātmaka tvam
ittham deśa guṇa svarūpa kathana prakrānta kāntāra ja kṣetra dravya guṇa anvaya kramam imam vargam paṭhitvā naraḥ
prāpnoti āśu bhiṣak prayoga viṣaya prāvīṇya pārīṇa tā ahaṃkurvāṇa suparva saṃsad agadaṅkāra kriyā kauśalam
asūta sutam īśvaraḥ śruta yaśāḥ yam aṣṭādaśa prabheda vidha vāc maya ambunidhi pāra pārīṇa dhīḥ

original: amuṣya nṛharīśituḥ kṛtivarasya vargaḥ kṛtāvasāvagamadādimaḥ sadabhidhānacūḍāmaṇau // Rajni_1.39
analyzed: amuṣya nṛhari īśituḥ kṛti varasya vargaḥ kṛtau asau agamat ādimaḥ sat abhidhāna cūḍāmaṇau
rājanighaṇṭu
dharaṇī ādi varga
atha dharaṇi dharitrī bhūtadhātrī dharā bhū kṣiti mahidharaṇī iḍā kṣmā avanī medinī ijyā

original: avanirudadhivastrā gauḥ kṣamā kṣauṇir urvī kurapi vasumatīrā kāśyapī ratragarbhā // Rajni_2.1
analyzed: avaniḥ udadhi vastrā gauḥ kṣamā kṣā oṇiḥ urvī kuḥ api vasumatī irā kāśyapī ratra garbhā  /

original: kṣamādimā bhūmirilā vasundharā varā ca dhātrī vasudhācalorvarā /
analyzed: kṣama ādimā bhūmiḥ ilā vasundharā varā ca dhātrī vasudhā acalā urvarā

original: viśvambharādyā jagatī kṣitī rasā pṛthvī ca gotrā pṛthivī pṛthur mahī // Rajni_2.2
analyzed: viśvambharā ādyā jagatī kṣitiḥ rasā pṛthvī ca gotrā pṛthivī pṛthuḥ mahī
kṣauṇī sarvasahā anantā bhūtamātā ca niścalā

original: bhūmī vījaprasūḥ śyāmā kroḍakāntā ca kīrtitā // Rajni_2.3

analyzed: sā bhūmiḥ urvarā ākhyā yā sarva śasya udbhava pradā
samasta vastu udbhavanāt urvarā nāma bhūḥ iyam

original: mṛn mṛttikā praśastā sā mṛtsā mṛtsneti ceṣyate // Rajni_2.5
analyzed: mṛd mṛttikā praśastā sā mṛtsā mṛtsnā iti ca iṣyate

original: kṣārā mṛdūṣaro deśas tadvān iraṇam ūṣaram /
analyzed: kṣārāḥ mṛdu ūṣaraḥ deśaḥ tadvān ūṣaram

original: khilam aprahataṃ prāhur dhanvā tu marur ucyate // Rajni_2.6
analyzed: khilam aprahatam prāhuḥ dhanvā tu maruḥ ucyate

original: maruprāyas tu yo deśaḥ sa cokto jāṅgalābhidhaḥ /
analyzed: maru prāyaḥ tu yaḥ deśaḥ sa ca uktaḥ jāṅgala abhidhaḥ

original: kṛṣṇamṛt kṛṣṇabhūmiḥ syāt pāṇḍubhūmis tu pāṇḍumṛt // Rajni_2.7
analyzed: kṛṣṇamṛd kṛṣṇa bhūmiḥ syāt pāṇḍu bhūmiḥ tu pāṇḍumṛd

original: sa śārkaraḥ śārkarilo deśo yaḥ śarkarānvitaḥ /
analyzed: sa śārkaraḥ deśaḥ yaḥ śarkarā anvitaḥ

original: saikataḥ syāt sikatilaḥ sikatāvāṃś ca yo bhavet // Rajni_2.8
analyzed: saikataḥ syāt sikatilaḥ sikatāvān ca yaḥ bhavet
deśaḥ janapadaḥ nīvṛt viṣayaḥ ca upavarttanam

original: pradeśaḥ sthānam ākhyā bhūr avakāśaḥ sthitiḥ padam // Rajni_2.9
analyzed: pradeśaḥ sthānam ākhyā bhūḥ avakāśaḥ sthitiḥ padam
nadī ambu jaiḥ bhṛtaḥ dhānyaiḥ nadī mātrakaḥ ucyate

original: vṛṣṭyambajais tu tair eṣa deśaḥ syād devamātṛkaḥ // Rajni_2.10
analyzed: vṛṣṭyamba jaiḥ tu taiḥ eṣa deśaḥ syāt devamātṛkaḥ
nadī vṛṣṭi jala udbhūtaiḥ nānā dhānyaiḥ samāvṛtaḥ

original: deśo dvayānugamanāt sa dvaimātṛka ucyate // Rajni_2.11
analyzed: deśaḥ dvaya anugamanāt sa dvaimātṛkaḥ ucyate

original: mudgādīnāṃ kṣetram udbhūtidaṃ yat tan maudgīnaṃ kodravīṇaṃ tathānyat /
analyzed: mudga ādīnām kṣetram udbhūti dam yat tat maudgīnam kodravīṇam tathā anyat

original: vraiheyaṃ syāt kiṃca śāleyam evaṃ buddhāṇavyañcāṇavīnaṃ ca vidyāt // Rajni_2.12
analyzed: vraiheyam syāt kiṃca śāleyam evam ca vidyāt

original: atha māṣyaṃ māṣīṇaṃ bhaṅgyaṃ bhāṅgīnam umyam aumīnam /
analyzed: atha māṣyam māṣīṇam umyam aumīnam

original: tilyaṃ tailīnaṃ syād iti ṣaṣṭikyaṃ ca yavyaṃ ca // Rajni_2.13
analyzed: tilyam tailīnam syāt iti ṣaṣṭikyam ca yavyam ca

original: śākāder yatra niṣpattir etat syāc chākaśākaṭam /
analyzed: śāka ādeḥ yatra niṣpattiḥ etat syāt śākaśākaṭam

original: śākaśākinam ity etat tathā vāstūkaśākaṭam // Rajni_2.14
analyzed: śākaśākinam iti etat tathā
atha giri dharaṇīdhra gotra bhūbhṛt śikhari śiloccaya śaila sānumantaḥ
kṣitibhṛt aga naga avanīdhara adri sthira kudharāḥ ca dharādharaḥ dharaḥ ca

original: ahāryaḥ parvato grāvā kaṭakī prasthavān api /
analyzed: ahāryaḥ parvataḥ grāvā kaṭakī prasthavān api

original: śṛṅgī ca vṛkṣavāṃś ceti śabdāḥ śailārthavācakāḥ // Rajni_2.16
analyzed: śṛṅgī ca vṛkṣavān ca iti śabdāḥ śaila artha vācakāḥ

original: madhyamas tu nitambaḥ syāt kaṭakaṃ mekhalā ca sā /
analyzed: madhyamaḥ tu nitambaḥ syāt kaṭakam mekhalā ca sā

original: taṭe taṭī prapātaś ca prasthe snuḥ sānusānunī // Rajni_2.17
analyzed: taṭe taṭī prapātaḥ ca prasthe snuḥ sānu sānunī  /

original: śṛṅgaṃ tu śikharaṃ kūṭaṃ kandare kandarā darī /
analyzed: śṛṅgam tu śikharam kūṭam kandare kandarā darī

original: vilaṃ guhā śilāsandhir devakhātaṃ ca gahvaram // Rajni_2.18
analyzed: vilam guhā śilā sandhiḥ devakhātam ca gahvaram
pratyanta girayaḥ pādāḥ gaṇḍaśailāḥ cyuta upalāḥ

original: ākaraḥ khanir ity ukto dhātavo gairikādayaḥ // Rajni_2.19
analyzed: ākaraḥ khaniḥ iti uktaḥ dhātavaḥ gairika ādayaḥ
grāvā prastara pāṣāṇau dṛṣad aśma upalaḥ śilā
lohāni vividhāni syuḥ aśmasāra ādi saṃjñayā

original: kānanaṃ gahanaṃ satraṃ kāntāraṃ vipinaṃ vanam /
analyzed: kānanam gahanam satram kāntāram vipinam vanam

original: araṇyam aṭavī dāvo davaś ca vanavācakāḥ // Rajni_2.21
analyzed: araṇyam aṭavī dāvaḥ davaḥ ca vana vācakāḥ

original: anyad udyānam ākrīḍo yatra krīḍanti rāgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: anyat udyānam ākrīḍaḥ yatra krīḍanti rāgiṇaḥ
nṛpa ālayeṣu pramada vanam antaḥpura ucitam
mahā vanam araṇyānī mahā araṇyam mahā aṭavī

original: athopavanam ārāmaḥ puraprānte vanaṃ tu yat // Rajni_2.23
analyzed: atha upavanam ārāmaḥ pura prānte vanam tu yat

original: kujaḥ kṣitiruho 'ṅghripaḥ śikharipādapau viṣṭaraḥ kuṭhas tarur anokahaḥ kuruhabhūruhadrudrumāḥ /
analyzed: kujaḥ kṣitiruhaḥ ṅghripaḥ śikhari pādapau viṣṭaraḥ kuṭhaḥ taruḥ anokahaḥ kuruha bhūruha dru drumāḥ
agaḥ naga vanaspatī viṭapi śākhi bhūja agamāḥ mahīja dharaṇīruha kṣitija vṛkṣa śāla ādayaḥ

original: phalitaḥ phalavān eṣa phalinaś ca phalī tathā /
analyzed: phalitaḥ phalavān eṣa phalinaḥ ca phalī tathā

original: phalegrahir abandhyo yaḥ syād amoghaphalodayaḥ // Rajni_2.25
analyzed: phalegrahiḥ abandhyaḥ yaḥ syāt amogha phala udayaḥ
atha avakeśī bandhyaḥ yam viphalaḥ niṣphalaḥ phalaḥ

original: uktau prāg ātmanā bhinnau vānaspatyavanaspatī // Rajni_2.26
analyzed: uktau prāk ātmanā bhinnau vānaspatya vanaspatī

original: mūlaṃ tu netraṃ pādaḥ syād aṅghriścaraṇam ity api /
analyzed: mūlam tu netram pādaḥ syāt aṅghriḥ caraṇam iti api

original: udbhedas tv aṅkuro jñeyaḥ praroho 'ṅkūra ity api // Rajni_2.27
analyzed: udbhedaḥ tu aṅkuraḥ jñeyaḥ prarohaḥ ṅkūraḥ iti api

original: arvāgbhāgo 'sya budhnaḥ syāt nitambaḥ sapṛthur bhavet /
analyzed: arvāc bhāgaḥ sya budhnaḥ syāt nitambaḥ sa pṛthuḥ bhavet

original: āskandhāt ta prakāṇḍaḥ syāt kāṇḍo daṇḍaś ca kathyate // Rajni_2.28
analyzed: ā skandhāt prakāṇḍaḥ syāt kāṇḍaḥ daṇḍaḥ ca kathyate

original: skandhapramāṇāsya latās tu śākhāḥ skandhotthaśākhās tu bhavanti śālāḥ /
analyzed: latāḥ tu śākhāḥ skandha uttha śākhāḥ tu bhavanti śālāḥ

original: jaṭāḥ śirās tasya kilāvarohāḥ śākhā śiphā majjani sāram āhuḥ // Rajni_2.29
analyzed: jaṭāḥ sirāḥ tasya kila avarohāḥ śākhā śiphāḥ majjani sāram āhuḥ

original: niṣkuṭaṃ koṭaraṃ proktaṃ tvaci valkaṃ tu valkalam /
analyzed: niṣkuṭam koṭaram proktam tvaci valkam tu valkalam
nava puṣpa āḍhya śākhā agre vallarī mañjarī tathā

original: parṇaṃ patraṃ dalaṃ barhaṃ palāśaṃ chadanaṃ chadaḥ /
analyzed: parṇam patram dalam barham palāśam chadanam chadaḥ

original: syāt pallavaḥ kiśalayaḥ prabālaḥ pallavaṃ navam // Rajni_2.31
analyzed: syāt pallavaḥ kiśalayaḥ prabālaḥ pallavam navam

original: vistāro viṭapaḥ proktaḥ prāgraṃ tu śikharaṃ śiraḥ /
analyzed: vistāraḥ viṭapaḥ proktaḥ prāgram tu śikharam śiraḥ

original: māḍhiḥ parṇaśirā jñeyā vṛntaṃ prasavabandhanam // Rajni_2.32
analyzed: māḍhiḥ parṇaśirāḥ jñeyā vṛntam prasava bandhanam
kula kṣāraka jālaka kalikāḥ tu kuḍamale kathitāḥ

original: kusumaṃ sumanaḥ prasūnaprasavasumaṃ sūnuphullapuṣpaṃ syāt // Rajni_2.33
analyzed: kusumam sumanaḥ prasūna prasava sumam sūnu phulla puṣpam syāt

original: pauṣpaṃ rajaḥ parāgaḥ syān madhulī dhūlikā ca sā // Rajni_2.34
analyzed: pauṣpam rajaḥ parāgaḥ syāt madhulī dhūlikā ca sā
samam parimala āmoda gandha saurabhya saurabham

original: ujjṛmbhitam ujjṛmbhaṃ smitam unmiṣitaṃ vinidram unnidram /
analyzed: ujjṛmbhitam ujjṛmbham smitam unmiṣitam vinidram unnidram
unmīlitam vijṛmbhitam udbuddha udbhiduḥ abhinnam udbhinnam
vikasita hasita vikasvara vikaca vyākośa phulla samphullam
sphuṭam udita dalita dīrṇa sphuṭita utphulla praphullam ekārtham

original: nidrāṇaṃ mudritaṃ suptaṃ militaṃ mīlitaṃ natam /
nikūṇitaṃ saṅkucitaṃ sanidram alasaṃ samam // Rajni_2.38
analyzed: nikūṇitam saṅkucitam sa nidram alasam samam

original: āhus tarūṇāṃ phalam atra śasyaṃ tad āmam uktaṃ hi śalāṭusaṃjñam /
analyzed: āhuḥ tarūṇām phalam atra śasyam tat āmam uktam hi śalāṭu saṃjñam

original: śuṣkaṃ tu vānaṃ pravadanti gulmastambau prakāṇḍairahito mahījaḥ // Rajni_2.39
analyzed: śuṣkam tu vānam pravadanti gulma stambau prakāṇḍaiḥ ahitaḥ mahījaḥ
ulapam gulminī vīrullatā vallī pratāninī

original: vratatiḥ pratatiś caiṣā vistīrṇā vīrud ucyate // Rajni_2.40
analyzed: vratatiḥ pratatiḥ ca eṣā vistīrṇā vīrudh ucyate
atha vakṣāmi nakṣatra vṛkṣān āgama lakṣitān

original: pūjyān āyuṣyadāṃś caiva varddhanāt pālanād api // Rajni_2.41
analyzed: pūjyān āyuṣya dān ca eva varddhanāt pālanāt api
viṣa dru dhātrī taru hema dugdhāḥ jambūḥ tathā khādira kṛṣṇa vaṃśāḥ

original: aśvatthanāgau ca vaṭaḥ palāśaḥ plakṣas tathāmbaṣṭhataruḥ krameṇa // Rajni_2.42
analyzed: aśvattha nāgau ca vaṭaḥ palāśaḥ plakṣaḥ tathā ambaṣṭha taruḥ krameṇa
bilva arjunau ca eva sa kesarāḥ śambara sarja vañjulāḥ

original: sapānasārkāś ca śamīkadambās tathāmranimbau madhukadrumaḥ kramāt // Rajni_2.43
analyzed: sa pānasa arkāḥ ca śamī kadambāḥ tathā āmra nimbau madhuka drumaḥ kramāt
amī nakṣatra daivatyāḥ vṛkṣāḥ syuḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ

original: yas tv eteṣām ātmajanmarkṣabhājāṃ martyaḥ kuryād bheṣajādīn madāndhaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu eteṣām ātma janma ṛkṣa bhājām martyaḥ kuryāt bheṣaja ādīn mada andhaḥ

original: tasyāyuṣyaṃ śrīkalatraṃ ca putro naśyaty eṣā vardhate varddhanādyaiḥ // Rajni_2.45
analyzed: tasya āyuṣyam śrī kalatram ca putraḥ naśyati eṣā vardhate varddhana ādyaiḥ

original: rucyaṃ saṃgrāhi śiśiraṃ puṣpaṃ tu rucidīpanam // Rajni_11.23

original: jambūs tu surabhipatrā nīlaphalā śyāmalā mahāskandhā /
analyzed: jambūḥ tu surabhi patrā nīla phalā śyāmalā mahā skandhā

original: rājārhā rājaphalā śukapriyā meghamodinī navāhvā // Rajni_11.24
śvāsātisārakaphakāsavināśanī ca viṣṭambhinī bhavati rocanapācanī ca // Rajni_11.25
analyzed: śvāsa atisāra kapha kāsa vināśanī ca viṣṭambhinī bhavati rocana pācanī ca

original: mahājambūr uṣṇā samadhurakaṣāyā śramaharā nirasyaty āsyasthaṃ jhaṭiti jaḍimānaṃ svarakarī /
analyzed: mahājambūḥ uṣṇā sa madhura kaṣāyā śrama harā nirasyati āsya stham jhaṭiti jaḍimānam svara karī

original: vidhatte viṣṭambhaṃ śamayati ca śoṣaṃ vitanute śramātīsārārttiśvasitakaphakāsapraśamanam // Rajni_11.27
analyzed: vidhatte viṣṭambham śamayati ca śoṣam vitanute śrama atīsāra ārtti śvasita kapha kāsa praśamanam

original: bhṛṅgeṣṭā kākanīlā ca dhvāṅkṣajambūr dhanapriyā // Rajni_11.28
kākajambūḥ kaṣāyāmlā pāke tu madhurā guruḥ /
anyā ca bhūmijambūr hrasvaphalā bhṛṅgavallabhā hrasvā /
analyzed: anyā ca bhūmijambūḥ hrasvaphalā bhṛṅgavallabhā hrasvā

original: bhūjambūr bhramareṣṭā pikabhakṣā kāṣṭhajambūś ca // Rajni_11.30
analyzed: bhūjambūḥ bhramareṣṭā pikabhakṣā kāṣṭhajambūḥ ca

original: sthūlaḥ kaṇṭaphalaś caiva syān mūlaphaladaḥ smṛtaḥ /
apuṣpaphaladaḥ pūtaphalo hy aṅkamitas tathā // Rajni_11.32
panasaṃ madhuraṃ supicchilaṃ guru hṛdyaṃ balavīryavṛddhidam /
analyzed: panasam madhuram su picchilam guru hṛdyam bala vīrya vṛddhi dam

original: śramadāhaviśoṣanāśanaṃ rucikṛd grāhi ca durjaraṃ param // Rajni_11.33
analyzed: śrama dāha viśoṣa nāśanam ruci kṛt grāhi ca durjaram param

original: īṣat kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ tadbījaṃ vātalaṃ guru /
analyzed: īṣat kaṣāyam madhuram tad bījam vātalam guru
tad phalasya vikāra ghnam rucyam tvac doṣa nāśanam

original: bālaṃ tu nīrasaṃ hṛdyaṃ madhyapakvaṃ tu dīpanam /
analyzed: tu

original: rucidaṃ lavaṇādy uktaṃ panasasya phalaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_11.35
ūrustambhā bhānuphalā vanalakṣmīś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_11.37
analyzed: ūrustambhā bhānuphalā vanalakṣmīḥ ca ṣoḍaśa

original: bālaṃ phalaṃ madhuram alpatayā kaṣāyaṃ pittāpahaṃ śiśirarucyam athāpi nālam /
analyzed: bālam phalam madhuram alpa tayā kaṣāyam pitta apaham śiśira rucyam atha api nālam

original: puṣpaṃ tad apy anuguṇaṃ krimihāri kandaṃ parṇaṃ ca śūlaśamakaṃ kadalībhavaṃ syāt // Rajni_11.38
analyzed: puṣpam tat api anuguṇam krimi hāri kandam parṇam ca śūla śamakam kadalī bhavam syāt

original: rambhāpakvaphalaṃ kaṣāyamadhuraṃ balyaṃ ca śītaṃ tathā pittaṃ cāsravimardanaṃ gurutaraṃ pathyaṃ na mandānale /
analyzed: rambhā pakva phalam kaṣāya madhuram balyam ca śītam tathā pittam ca asra vimardanam gurutaram pathyam na manda anale

original: sadyaḥ śukravivṛddhidaṃ klamaharaṃ tṛṣṇāpahaṃ kāntidaṃ dīptāgnau sukhadaṃ kaphāmayakaraṃ santarpaṇaṃ durjaram // Rajni_11.39
analyzed: sadyas śukra vivṛddhi dam klama haram tṛṣṇā apaham kānti dam dīpta agnau sukha dam kapha āmaya karam santarpaṇam durjaram
kāṣṭhakadalī sukāṣṭhā vanakadalī kāṣṭhikā śilārambhā

original: dārukadalī phalāḍhyā vanamocā cāśmakadalī ca // Rajni_11.40
analyzed: dārukadalī phalāḍhyā vanamocā ca aśmakadalī ca
syāt kāṣṭhakadalī rucyā rakta pitta harā himā

original: gurur mandāgnijananī durjarā madhurā parā // Rajni_11.41
analyzed: guruḥ manda agni jananī durjarā madhurā parā

original: tṛṭpittadāhaśoṣapraśamanakartrī ca durjarā ca guruḥ // Rajni_11.43
analyzed: tṛṣ pitta dāha śoṣa praśamana kartrī ca durjarā ca guruḥ

original: anyā suvarṇakadalī suvarṇarambhā ca kanakarambhā ca /
analyzed: anyā suvarṇa kadalī suvarṇa rambhā ca kanaka rambhā ca

original: pītā suvarṇamocā campakarambhā surambhikā subhagā // Rajni_11.44
hemaphalā svarṇaphalā kanakastambhā ca pītarambhā ca /
analyzed: hemaphalā svarṇaphalā kanakastambhā ca pītarambhā ca

original: gaurā ca gaurarambhā kāñcanakadalī surapriyā ṣaḍbhūḥ // Rajni_11.45
analyzed: gaurā ca gaurarambhā kāñcanakadalī surapriyā ṣaṣ bhūḥ

original: suvarṇamocā madhurā himā ca svalpāśane dīpanakāriṇī ca /
analyzed: suvarṇamocā madhurā himā ca su alpa aśane dīpana kāriṇī ca

original: tṛṣṇāpahā dāhavimocanī ca kaphāvahā vṛṣyakarī guruś ca // Rajni_11.46
analyzed: tṛṣṇā apahā dāha vimocanī ca kapha āvahā vṛṣya karī guruḥ ca
tṛṇarājaḥ skandhataruḥ dākṣiṇātyaḥ durāruhaḥ

original: nārikelasalilaṃ laghu balyaṃ śītalaṃ ca madhuraṃ guru pāke pittapīnasatṛṣāśramadāhaśānti śoṣaśamanaṃ sukhadāyi /
analyzed: nārikela salilam laghu balyam śītalam ca madhuram guru pāke pitta pīnasa tṛṣā śrama dāha śānti śoṣa śamanam sukha dāyi

original: pakvam etad api kiṃcid ihoktaṃ pittakāri rucidaṃ madhuraṃ ca dīpanaṃ balakaraṃ guru vṛṣyaṃ vīryavardhanam idaṃ tu vadanti // Rajni_11.50
analyzed: pakvam etat api kiṃcid iha uktam pitta kāri ruci dam madhuram ca dīpanam bala karam guru vṛṣyam vīrya vardhanam idam tu vadanti

original: khubaraṃ nārikelasya snigdhaṃ guru ca durjaram /
analyzed: khubaram nārikelasya snigdham guru ca durjaram
dāha viṣṭambha dam rucyam bala vīrya vivardhanam

original: mākṣikaphalo mṛduphalo bahukūrco hrasvaphalaś ca vasugaṇitāhvaḥ // Rajni_11.52

analyzed: madhuram madhunārikelam uktam śiśiram dāha tṛṣā ārti pitta hāri

original: balapuṣṭikaraṃ ca kāntim agryaṃ kurute vīryavivardhanaṃ ca rucyam // Rajni_11.53
analyzed: bala puṣṭi karam ca kāntim agryam kurute vīrya vivardhanam ca rucyam

original: mādhvīkaṃ nārikelaṃ phalam atimadhuraṃ durjaraṃ jantukāri snigdhaṃ vātātisāraśramaśamanam atha dhvaṃsanaṃ vahnidīpteḥ /
analyzed: mādhvīkam nārikelam phalam ati madhuram durjaram jantu kāri snigdham vāta atisāra śrama śamanam atha dhvaṃsanam vahni dīpteḥ

original: āmaśleṣmaprakopaṃ janayati kurute cārukāntiṃ balaṃ ca sthairyaṃ dehasya dhatte ghanamadanakalāvardhanaṃ pittanāśam // Rajni_11.54
analyzed: āma śleṣma prakopam janayati kurute cāru kāntim balam ca sthairyam dehasya dhatte ghana madana kalā vardhanam pitta nāśam
kharjūrī tu kharaskandhā duṣpradharṣām durāruhā

original: niḥśreṇī ca kaṣāyā ca yavaneṣṭā haripriyā // Rajni_11.55
analyzed: niḥśreṇī ca kaṣāyā ca yavaneṣṭā haripriyā

original: kharjūrī tu kaṣāyā ca pakvā gaulyakaṣāyakā /
pittaghnī kaphadā caiva krimikṛd vṛṣyabṛṃhaṇī // Rajni_11.56
analyzed: pitta ghnī kapha dā ca eva krimi kṛt vṛṣya bṛṃhaṇī

original: madhukharjūrī tv anyā madhukarkaṭikā ca kolakarkaṭikā /
analyzed: madhukharjūrī tu anyā madhukarkaṭikā ca kolakarkaṭikā

original: kaṇṭakinī madhuphalikā mādhvī madhurā ca madhurakharjūrī // Rajni_11.57
analyzed: kaṇṭakinī madhuphalikā mādhvī madhurā ca madhurakharjūrī

original: śiśirā ca jantukarī bahuvīryavivardhanaṃ tanute // Rajni_11.58
analyzed: śiśirā ca jantu karī bahu vīrya vivardhanam tanute
bhūkharjūrī bhuktā vasudhākharjūrikā ca bhūmikharjūrī

original: bhūkharjūrī madhurā śiśirā ca vidāhapittaharā // Rajni_11.59
analyzed: bhūkharjūrī madhurā śiśirā ca vidāha pitta harā
dīpyā ca piṇḍakharjūrī sthalapiṇḍā madhusravā
tathā anyā rājakharjūrī rājapiṇḍā nṛpapriyā

original: dāhaghnī madhurāsrapittaśamanī tṛṣṇārtidoṣāpahā śītā śvāsakaphaśramodayaharā santarpaṇī puṣṭidā /
analyzed: dāha ghnī madhurā asra pitta śamanī tṛṣṇā ārti doṣa apahā śītā śvāsa kapha śrama udaya harā santarpaṇī puṣṭi dā

original: vahner māndyakarī gurur viṣaharā hṛdyā ca datte balaṃ snigdhā vīryavivardhanī ca kathitā piṇḍākhyakharjūrikā // Rajni_11.63
analyzed: vahneḥ māndya karī guruḥ viṣa harā hṛdyā ca datte balam snigdhā vīrya vivardhanī ca kathitā piṇḍākhyakharjūrikā

original: cāraḥ khadruḥ kharaskandho lalanaś cārakas tathā /
analyzed: cāraḥ khadruḥ kharaskandhaḥ lalanaḥ cārakaḥ tathā
bahuvalkaḥ priyālaḥ ca navadruḥ tāpasapriyaḥ

original: cārasya ca phalaṃ pakvaṃ vṛṣyaṃ gaulyāmlakaṃ guru /
analyzed: cārasya ca phalam pakvam vṛṣyam gaulya amlakam guru
tad bījam madhuram vṛṣyam pitta dāha ārti nāśanam

original: krimighnas tailabījaś ca vātāriḥ sphoṭabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.66
vahnir varataruś ceti vijñeyaḥ ṣoḍaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.67
bhallātakaḥ kaṭus tiktaḥ kaṣāyoṣṇaḥ krimīñ jayet /
analyzed: jayet
bhallātasya phalam kaṣāya madhuram koṣṇam kapha ārti śrama śvāsa ānāha vibandha śūla jaṭhara ādhmāna krimi dhvaṃsanam

original: tanmajjā ca viśoṣadāhaśamanī pittāpahā tarpaṇī vātārocakahāridīptijananī pittāpahā tv añjasā // Rajni_11.69
analyzed: tad majjā ca viśoṣa dāha śamanī pitta apahā tarpaṇī vāta arocaka hāri dīpti jananī pitta apahā tu añjasā
dṛḍhaskandhaḥ kṣīraśuklaḥ tri pañcadhā

original: vṛṣyā sthaulyakarī hṛdyā susnigdhā mehanāśakṛt // Rajni_11.72
analyzed: vṛṣyā sthaulya karī hṛdyā su snigdhā meha nāśa kṛt

original: karako raktabījaś ca suphalo dantabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.73
maṇibījas tathā valkaphalo vṛttaphalaś ca saḥ /
sunīlo nīlapatraś ca jñeyaḥ saptadaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.74

analyzed: dāḍimam madhuram amla kaṣāyam kāsa vāta kapha pitta vināśi

original: grāhi dīpanakaraṃ ca laghūṣṇaṃ śītalaṃ śramaharaṃ rucidāyi // Rajni_11.75
analyzed: grāhi dīpana karam ca laghu uṣṇam śītalam śrama haram ruci dāyi

original: dāḍimaṃ dvividham īritam āryair amlam ekam aparaṃ madhuraṃ ca /
analyzed: dāḍimam dvividham īritam āryaiḥ amlam ekam aparam madhuram ca

original: tatra vātakaphahāri kilāmlaṃ tāpahāri madhuraṃ laghu pathyam // Rajni_11.76
analyzed: tatra vāta kapha hāri kila amlam tāpa hāri madhuram laghu pathyam

original: sphūrjako rāmaṇaś caiva sphūrjanaḥ syandanāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.77
tindukas tu kaṣāyaḥ syāt saṃgrāhī vātakṛt paraḥ /
analyzed: tindukaḥ tu kaṣāyaḥ syāt saṃgrāhī vāta kṛt paraḥ

original: pakvas tu madhuraḥ snigdho durjaraḥ śleṣmalo guruḥ // Rajni_11.78
analyzed: pakvaḥ tu madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ durjaraḥ śleṣmalaḥ guruḥ
tindukaḥ nyaḥ kākapīluḥ kākāṇḍaḥ kākatindukaḥ

original: kākasphūrjaś ca kākenduḥ kākāhvaḥ kākabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.79
analyzed: ca

original: pakvas tu madhuraḥ kiṃcit kaphakṛt pittavāntihṛt // Rajni_11.80
analyzed: pakvaḥ tu madhuraḥ kiṃcid kapha kṛt pitta vānti hṛt

original: kīreṣṭaḥ kandarālaś ca madhumajjā bṛhacchadaḥ // Rajni_11.81
analyzed: kīreṣṭaḥ kandarālaḥ ca madhumajjā bṛhacchadaḥ
akṣoṭaḥ madhuraḥ balyaḥ snigdha uṣṇaḥ vāta pitta jit

original: pītuḥ śītaḥ sahasrāṃśī dhānī guḍaphalas tathā /
saraḥ svāduś ca gulmārśaḥśamano dīpanaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_11.84
analyzed: saraḥ svāduḥ ca gulma arśaḥ śamanaḥ dīpanaḥ paraḥ
anyaḥ ca eva bṛhatpīluḥ mahāpīluḥ mahāphalaḥ
madhuraḥ tu mahāpīluḥ vṛṣyaḥ viṣa vināśanaḥ

original: pārevataṃ tu raivatam ārevatakaṃ ca kiṃca raivatakam /
analyzed: pārevatam tu raivatam ārevatakam ca kiṃca raivatakam

original: madhuphalam amṛtaphalākhyaṃ pārevatakaṃ ca saptāhvam // Rajni_11.87
pārevataṃ tu madhuraṃ krimivātahāri vṛṣyaṃ tṛṣājvaravidāhaharaṃ ca hṛdyam /
analyzed: pārevatam tu madhuram krimi vāta hāri vṛṣyam tṛṣā jvara vidāha haram ca hṛdyam

original: mūrchābhramaśramaviśoṣavināśakāri snigdhaṃ ca rucyam uditaṃ bahuvīryadāyi // Rajni_11.88
analyzed: mūrchā bhrama śrama viśoṣa vināśa kāri snigdham ca rucyam uditam bahu vīrya dāyi
mahāpārevatam ca anyat svarṇapārevatam tathā

original: sāmrāṇijaṃ khārikaṃ ca raktaraivatakaṃ ca tat /
analyzed: sāmrāṇijam khārikam ca raktaraivatakam ca tat

original: vṛṣyaṃ mūrchājvaraghnaṃ ca pūrvoktād adhikaṃ guṇaiḥ // Rajni_11.90
analyzed: vṛṣyam mūrchā jvara ghnam ca pūrva uktāt adhikam guṇaiḥ
madhūkaḥ madhu vṛkṣaḥ syāt madhuṣṭhīlaḥ madhusravaḥ

original: guḍapuṣpo lodhrapuṣpo vānaprasthaś ca mādhavaḥ // Rajni_11.91
analyzed: guḍapuṣpaḥ lodhrapuṣpaḥ vānaprasthaḥ ca mādhavaḥ
anyaḥ jalamadhūkaḥ maṅgalyaḥ dīrghapatrakaḥ madhupuṣpaḥ

original: kṣaudrapriyaḥ pataṅgaḥ kīreṣṭo gairikākṣaś ca // Rajni_11.93
analyzed: kṣaudrapriyaḥ pataṅgaḥ kīreṣṭaḥ gairikākṣaḥ ca

original: vṛṣyo vāntiharaḥ śīto balakārī rasāyanaḥ // Rajni_11.94
analyzed: vṛṣyaḥ vānti haraḥ śītaḥ bala kārī rasāyanaḥ

original: madhūkapuṣpaṃ madhuraṃ ca vṛṣyaṃ hṛdyaṃ himaṃ pittavidāhahāri /
analyzed: madhūka puṣpam madhuram ca vṛṣyam hṛdyam himam pitta vidāha hāri

original: phalaṃ ca vātāmayapittanāśi jñeyaṃ madhūkadvayam evam etat // Rajni_11.95
analyzed: phalam ca vāta āmaya pitta nāśi jñeyam madhūka dvayam evam etat

original: bhavyaṃ bhavaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhāvanaṃ vaktraśodhanam /
tathā picchalabījaṃ ca tac ca lomaphalaṃ matam // Rajni_11.96
analyzed: tathā picchalabījam ca tat ca lomaphalam matam

original: bhavyam amlaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca bālaṃ vātakaphāpaham /
pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlaṃ ca rucikṛt sāmaśūlahṛt // Rajni_11.97
analyzed: pakvam tu madhura amlam ca ruci kṛt sāma śūla hṛt

original: ārukaṃ vīrasenaṃ ca vīraṃ vīrārukaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ārukam vīrasenam ca vīram vīrārukam tathā
tatra vidyāt catur jātīḥ patra puṣpa ādi bhedataḥ

original: ārukāṇi ca sarvāṇi madhurāṇi himāni ca /
analyzed: ārukāṇi ca sarvāṇi madhurāṇi himāni ca
arśaḥ prameha gulma asra doṣa vidhvaṃsanāni ca

original: gucchaphalā rasālā ca jñeyāmṛtaphalā ca sā // Rajni_11.100

analyzed: drākṣā ati madhurā amlā ca śītā pitta ārti dāha jit

original: mūtradoṣaharā rucyā vṛṣyā saṃtarpaṇī parā // Rajni_11.101
analyzed: mūtra doṣa harā rucyā vṛṣyā saṃtarpaṇī parā

original: anyā kapiladrākṣā mṛdvīkā gostanī ca kapilaphalā /
analyzed: anyā kapiladrākṣā mṛdvīkā gostanī ca kapilaphalā

original: amṛtarasā dīrghaphalā madhuvallī madhuphalā madhūlī ca // Rajni_11.102
analyzed: amṛtarasā dīrghaphalā madhuvallī madhuphalā madhūlī ca

original: haritā ca hārahūrā suphalā mṛdvī himottarāpathikā /
analyzed: haritā ca hārahūrā suphalā mṛdvī himottarā pathikā

original: gostanī madhurā śītā hṛdyā ca madaharṣaṇī /
analyzed: gostanī madhurā śītā hṛdyā ca mada harṣaṇī
dāha mūrchā jvara śvāsa tṛṣā hṛllāsa nāśinī

original: anyā sā kākalīdrākṣā jambukā ca phalottamā /
analyzed: anyā sā kākalīdrākṣā jambukā ca phalottamā

original: drākṣābālaphalaṃ kaṭūṣṇaviśadaṃ pittāsradoṣapradaṃ madhyaṃ cāmlarasaṃ rasāntaragate rucyātivahnipradam /
analyzed: drākṣā bāla phalam kaṭu uṣṇa viśadam pittāsra doṣa pradam madhyam ca amla rasam rasa antara gate rucya ati vahni pradam

original: pakvaṃ cen madhuraṃ tathāmlasahitaṃ tṛṣṇāsrapittāpahaṃ pakvaṃ śuṣkatamaṃ śramārtiśamanaṃ santarpaṇaṃ puṣṭidam // Rajni_11.106
analyzed: pakvam ced madhuram tathā amla sahitam tṛṣṇā asrapitta apaham pakvam śuṣkatamam śrama ārti śamanam santarpaṇam puṣṭi dam

original: śītā pittāsradoṣaṃ damayati madhurā snigdhapākātirucyā cakṣuṣyā śvāsakāsaśramavamiśamanī śophatṛṣṇājvaraghnī /
analyzed: śītā pittāsra doṣam damayati madhurā snigdha pākā ati rucyā cakṣuṣyā śvāsa kāsa śrama vami śamanī śopha tṛṣṇā jvara ghnī

original: dāhādhmānabhramādīn apanayati parā tarpaṇī pakvaśuṣkā drākṣā sukṣīṇavīryān api madanakalākelidakṣān vidhatte // Rajni_11.107
analyzed: dāha ādhmāna bhrama ādīn apanayati parā tarpaṇī pakva śuṣkā drākṣā su kṣīṇa vīryān api madana kalā keli dakṣān vidhatte

original: karmāraḥ karmarakaḥ pītaphalaḥ karmaraś ca mudgarakaḥ /
analyzed: karmāraḥ karmarakaḥ pītaphalaḥ karmaraḥ ca mudgarakaḥ

original: mudgaraphalaś ca dhārāphalakas tu karmārakaś caiva // Rajni_11.108
analyzed: mudgaraphalaḥ ca dhārāphalakaḥ tu karmārakaḥ ca eva

original: pakvas tu madhurāmlaḥ syād balapuṣṭirucipradaḥ // Rajni_11.109
nīlamaṇḍalam alpāsthi paruṣaṃ ca parus tathā // Rajni_11.110
analyzed: nīlamaṇḍalam alpāsthi paruṣam ca paruḥ tathā

original: parūṣam amlaṃ kaṭukaṃ kaphārtijid vātāpahaṃ tatphalam eva pittadam /
analyzed: parūṣam amlam kaṭukam kapha ārti jit vāta apaham tad phalam eva pitta dam

original: soṣṇaṃ ca pakvaṃ madhuraṃ rucipradaṃ pittāpahaṃ śophaharaṃ ca pītam // Rajni_11.111
analyzed: sa uṣṇam ca pakvam madhuram ruci pradam pitta apaham śopha haram ca pītam

original: śubhado bodhivṛkṣaś ca yājñiko gajabhakṣakaḥ // Rajni_11.112
analyzed: śubhadaḥ bodhivṛkṣaḥ ca yājñikaḥ gajabhakṣakaḥ

original: śrīmān kṣīradrumo vipro maṅgalyaḥ śyāmalaś ca saḥ /
pippalo guhyapuṣpaś ca sevyaḥ satyaḥ śucidrumaḥ /
pippalaḥ sumadhuras tu kaṣāyaḥ śītalaś ca kaphapittavināśī /
analyzed: pippalaḥ su madhuraḥ tu kaṣāyaḥ śītalaḥ ca kapha pitta vināśī

original: raktadāhaśamanaḥ sa hi sadyo yonidoṣaharaṇaḥ kila pakvaḥ // Rajni_11.114
analyzed: rakta dāha śamanaḥ sa hi sadyas yoni doṣa haraṇaḥ kila pakvaḥ

original: aśvatthavṛkṣasya phalāni pakvāny atīvahṛdyāni ca śītalāni /
analyzed: aśvattha vṛkṣasya phalāni pakvāni atīva hṛdyāni ca śītalāni
kurvanti pittāsra viṣa ārti dāha vicchardi śoṣa aruci doṣa nāśam

original: syād atha vaṭo jaṭālo nyagrodho rohiṇo 'varohī ca /
analyzed: syāt atha vaṭaḥ jaṭālaḥ nyagrodhaḥ rohiṇaḥ varohī ca

original: viṭapī raktaphalaś ca skandharuho maṇḍalī mahācchāyaḥ // Rajni_11.116
analyzed: viṭapī raktaphalaḥ ca skandharuhaḥ maṇḍalī mahā chāyaḥ

original: kṣīrī śiphāruhaḥ syād bahupādaḥ sa tu vanaspatir navabhūḥ // Rajni_11.117
analyzed: kṣīrī śiphāruhaḥ syāt bahupādaḥ sa tu vanaspatiḥ nava bhūḥ
vaṭaḥ kaṣāyaḥ madhuraḥ śiśiraḥ kapha pitta jit

original: amarā saṅginī caiva kṣīrakāṣṭhā ca kīrtitā // Rajni_11.119
analyzed: amarā saṅginī ca eva kṣīrakāṣṭhā ca kīrtitā
vaṭī kaṣāya madhurā śiśirā pitta hāriṇī
dāha tṛṣṇā śrama śvāsa vicchardi śamanī parā

original: pippalikā vanasthā ca kṣudrā cāśvatthasaṃnibhā // Rajni_11.121
analyzed: pippalikā vanasthā ca kṣudrā ca aśvattha saṃnibhā
aśvatthikā tu madhurā kaṣāyā ca asrapitta jit
plakṣaḥ kapītanaḥ kṣīrī supārśvaḥ kamaṇḍaluḥ

original: dṛḍhaprarohaḥ plavakaḥ plavaṅgaś ca mahābalaḥ // Rajni_11.123
analyzed: dṛḍhaprarohaḥ plavakaḥ plavaṅgaḥ ca mahā balaḥ
plakṣaḥ ca eva aparaḥ hrasvaḥ suśītaḥ śītavīryakaḥ

original: puṇḍro mahāvarohaś ca hrasvaparṇas tu pimpariḥ /
analyzed: puṇḍraḥ mahāvarohaḥ ca hrasvaparṇaḥ tu pimpariḥ
mūrchā bhrama pralāpa ghnaḥ hrasvaplakṣaḥ viśeṣataḥ
kālaskandhaḥ yajñayogyaḥ yajñīyaḥ supratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: saumyaḥ śītaphalaś ceti manusaṃjñaḥ samīritaḥ // Rajni_11.127
udumbaraṃ kaṣāyaṃ syāt pakvaṃ tu madhuraṃ himam /
audumbaraṃ phalam atīva himaṃ supakvaṃ pittāpahaṃ ca madhuraṃ śramaśophahāri /
analyzed: audumbaram phalam atīva himam su pakvam pitta apaham ca madhuram śrama śopha hāri

original: āmaṃ kaṣāyam atidīpanarocanaṃ ca māṃsasya vṛddhikaram asravikārakāri // Rajni_11.129
analyzed: āmam kaṣāyam ati dīpana rocanam ca māṃsasya vṛddhi karam asra vikāra kāri

original: rasavīryavipākeṣu kiṃcin nyūnā ca pūrvataḥ // Rajni_11.131
analyzed: rasa vīrya vipākeṣu kiṃcid nyūnā ca pūrvataḥ
kṛṣṇodumbarikā ca anyā kharapatrī ca rājikā

original: udumbarī ca kaṭhinā kuṣṭhaghnī phalguvāṭikā // Rajni_11.132

analyzed: ajākṣī phalgunī ca eva malapūḥ citrabheṣajā
tvagdoṣa pitta rakta ghnī tad valkam ca atisara jit

original: subījaḥ suphalaḥ svacchaḥ surasaḥ smṛtisammitaḥ // Rajni_11.137
badaraṃ madhuraṃ kaṣāyam amlaṃ paripakvaṃ madhurāmlam uṣṇam etat /
analyzed: badaram madhuram kaṣāyam amlam paripakvam madhura amlam uṣṇam etat
kapha kṛt pacana atisāra rakta śrama śoṣa ārti vināśanam ca rucyam
tvacā visphoṭa śamanī bījam netra āmaya apaham
rājabadaraḥ nṛpeṣṭaḥ nṛpabadaraḥ rājavallabhaḥ ca eva

original: pṛthukolas tanubījo madhuraphalo rājakolaś ca // Rajni_11.140
vṛṣyaś ca vīryavṛddhiṃ kurute śoṣaśramaṃ harati // Rajni_11.141
analyzed: vṛṣyaḥ ca vīrya vṛddhim kurute śoṣa śramam harati

original: bhūbadarī kṣitibadarī vallībadarī ca badarivallī ca /
analyzed: bhūbadarī kṣitibadarī vallībadarī ca badarivallī ca

original: bahuphalikā laghubadarī badaraphalī sūkṣmabadarī ca // Rajni_11.142
analyzed: bahuphalikā laghubadarī badaraphalī sūkṣmabadarī ca
dīpana pācana kartrī kiṃcid pittāsra kāriṇī rucyā

original: madhuraḥ śambarāhāraḥ śikhipriyaś caiva nirdiṣṭaḥ // Rajni_11.144
analyzed: madhuraḥ śambarāhāraḥ śikhipriyaḥ ca eva nirdiṣṭaḥ

original: snigdhaṃ tu jantukārakam īṣat pittārtidāhaśoṣaghnam // Rajni_11.145
analyzed: snigdham tu jantu kārakam īṣat pitta ārti dāha śoṣa ghnam

original: bījakaḥ keśarāmlaś ca mātuluṅgaḥ supūrakaḥ // Rajni_11.146

analyzed: bījapūra phalam amla kaṭu uṣṇam śvāsa kāsa śamanam pacanam ca

original: kaṇṭhaśodhanaparaṃ laghu hṛdyaṃ dīpanaṃ ca rucikṛj jaraṇaṃ ca // Rajni_11.148
analyzed: kaṇṭha śodhana param laghu hṛdyam dīpanam ca ruci kṛt jaraṇam ca

original: bālaṃ pittamarutkaphāsrakaraṇaṃ madhyaṃ ca tādṛgvidhaṃ pakvaṃ varṇakaraṃ ca hṛdyam atha tat puṣṇāti puṣṭiṃ balam /
analyzed: bālam pitta marut kapha asra karaṇam madhyam ca tādṛgvidham pakvam varṇa karam ca hṛdyam atha tat puṣṇāti puṣṭim balam

original: śūlājīrṇavibandhamārutakaphaśvāsārtimandāgnijit kāsārocakaśophaśāntidam idaṃ syān mātuluṅgaṃ sadā // Rajni_11.149
analyzed: śūla ajīrṇa vibandha māruta kapha śvāsa ārti manda agni jit kāsa arocaka śopha śānti dam idam syāt mātuluṅgam sadā

original: tvak tiktā durjarā syāt kṛmikaphapavanadhvaṃsinī snigdham uṣṇaṃ madhyaṃ śūlārtipittapraśamanam akhilārocakaghnaṃ ca gaulyam /
analyzed: tvac tiktā durjarā syāt kṛmi kapha pavana dhvaṃsinī snigdham uṣṇam madhyam śūla ārti pitta praśamanam akhila arocaka ghnam ca gaulyam

original: vātārtighnaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ jaṭharagadaharaṃ kesaraṃ dīpyam amlaṃ bījaṃ tiktaṃ kaphārśaḥśvayathuśamakaraṃ bījapūrasya pathyam // Rajni_11.150
analyzed: vāta ārti ghnam kaṭu uṣṇam jaṭhara gada haram kesaram dīpyam amlam bījam tiktam kapha arśaḥ śvayathu śama karam bījapūrasya pathyam
vanabījapūrakaḥ nyaḥ vanajaḥ vanapūrakaḥ ca vanabījaḥ

original: atyamlā gandhāḍhyā vanodbhavā devadūtī ca // Rajni_11.151
pītā ca devadāsī deveṣṭā mātuluṅgikā caiva /
analyzed: pītā ca devadāsī deveṣṭā mātuluṅgikā ca eva

original: pavanī mahāphalā ca syād iyam iti vedabhūmimitā // Rajni_11.152
analyzed: pavanī mahāphalā ca syāt iyam iti veda bhūmi mitā

original: amlaḥ kaṭūṣṇo vanabījapūro ruciprado vātavināśanaś ca /
syād amladoṣakṛmināśakārī kaphāpahaḥ śvāsaniṣūdanaś ca // Rajni_11.153
analyzed: syāt amla doṣa kṛmi nāśa kārī kapha apahaḥ śvāsa niṣūdanaḥ ca

original: madhukarkaṭī madhuraphalā mahāphalā vardhamānā ca // Rajni_11.154
analyzed: madhukarkaṭī madhuraphalā mahāphalā vardhamānā ca

original: tridoṣaśamanī rucyā vṛṣyā ca gurudurjarā // Rajni_11.155
analyzed: tridoṣa śamanī rucyā vṛṣyā ca guru durjarā

original: āmalakī vayaḥsthā ca śrīphalā dhātrikā tathā /
analyzed: āmalakī vayaḥsthā ca śrīphalā dhātrikā tathā

original: amṛtā ca śivā śāntā śītāmṛtaphalā tathā // Rajni_11.156
analyzed: amṛtā ca śivā śāntā śītā amṛtaphalā tathā

original: jātīphalā ca dhātreyī jñeyā dhātrīphalā tathā /
vṛṣyā vṛttaphalā caiva rocanī śarabhūhvayā // Rajni_11.157

analyzed: āmalakam kaṣāya amlam madhuram śiśiram laghu
dāha pitta vamī meha śopha ghnam ca rasāyanam

original: kaṭu madhurakaṣāyaṃ kiṃcid amlaṃ kaphaghnaṃ rucikaram atiśītaṃ hanti pittāsratāpam /
analyzed: kaṭu madhura kaṣāyam kiṃcid amlam kapha ghnam ruci karam ati śītam hanti pittāsra tāpam
śrama vamana vibandha ādhmāna viṣṭambha doṣa praśamanam amṛta ābham ca āmalakyāḥ phalam syāt
anyat ca āmalakam proktam kāṣṭhadhātrīphalam tathā

original: śītaṃ pittāsradoṣaghnaṃ pūrvoktam adhikaṃ guṇaiḥ // Rajni_11.161
analyzed: śītam pittāsra doṣa ghnam pūrva uktam adhikam guṇaiḥ

original: ciñcā tu cukrikā cukrā sāmlikā śākacukrikā /
amlī sutintiḍī cāmlā cukrikā ca navābhidhā // Rajni_11.162
ciñcātyamlā bhaved āmā pakvā tu madhurāmlikā /
analyzed: ciñcā ati amlā bhavet āmā pakvā tu madhurā amlikā

original: amlikāyāḥ phalaṃ tv āmam atyamlaṃ laghu pittakṛt /
pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlaṃ syād bhedi viṣṭambhavātajit // Rajni_11.164
analyzed: pakvam tu madhura amlam syāt bhedi viṣṭambha vāta jit
ciñcā patram ca śopha ghnam rakta doṣa vyathā apaham
tasyāḥ śuṣka tvacā kṣāram śūla manda agni nāśanam

original: ciñcāmlam amlacūḍaś ca ciñcāraso 'pi saptadhā // Rajni_11.167
analyzed: ciñcāmlam amlacūḍaḥ ca ciñcārasaḥ saptadhā
sāmyena śarkarā miśraḥ dāha pitta kapha ārtti

original: śṛṅgī kapirasāḍhyaś ca tanukṣīraḥ kapipriyaḥ // Rajni_11.169
pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlāḍhyaṃ snigdhaṃ pittakaphāpaham // Rajni_11.170
analyzed: pakvam tu madhura amla āḍhyam snigdham pitta kapha apaham

original: nāraṅgaḥ syān nāgaraṅgaḥ suraṅgas tvaggandhaś cairāvato vaktravāsaḥ /
analyzed: nāraṅgaḥ syāt nāgaraṅgaḥ suraṅgaḥ tvaggandhaḥ ca airāvataḥ vaktravāsaḥ

original: yogīraṅgo nāgaro yogaraṅgaḥ gandhāḍhyo 'yaṃ gandhapatro ravīṣṭaḥ // Rajni_11.171
nāraṅgaṃ madhuraṃ cāmlaṃ gurūṣṇaṃ caiva rocanam /
analyzed: nāraṅgam madhuram ca amlam guru uṣṇam ca eva rocanam

original: nimbūkaḥ syād amlajambīrakākhyo vahnir dīpyo vahnibījo 'mlasāraḥ /
dantāghātaḥ śodhano jantumārī nimbūś ca syād rocano rudrasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_11.173
nimbūphalaṃ prathitam amlarasaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ gulmāmavātaharam agnivivṛddhikāri /
analyzed: nimbū phalam prathitam amla rasam kaṭu uṣṇam gulma āma vāta haram agni vivṛddhi kāri

original: cakṣuṣyam etad atha kāsakaphārttikaṇṭhavicchardihāri paripakvam atīva rucyam // Rajni_11.174
analyzed: cakṣuṣyam etat atha kāsa kapha ārtti kaṇṭha vicchardi hāri paripakvam atīva rucyam
jambīraḥ dantaśaṭhaḥ jambhaḥ jambhīra jambhalau ca eva

original: rocanako mukhaśodhī jāḍyārir jantujin navadhā // Rajni_11.175
jambīrasya phalaṃ rase 'mlamadhuraṃ vātāpahaṃ pittakṛt pathyaṃ pācanarocanaṃ balakaraṃ vahner vivṛddhipradam /
analyzed: jambīrasya phalam rase mla madhuram vāta apaham pitta kṛt pathyam pācana rocanam bala karam vahneḥ vivṛddhi pradam

original: pakvaṃ cen madhuraṃ kaphārttiśamanaṃ pittāsradoṣāpanut varṇyaṃ vīryavivarddhanaṃ ca rucikṛt puṣṭipradaṃ tarpaṇam // Rajni_11.176
analyzed: pakvam ced madhuram kapha ārtti śamanam pittāsra doṣa apanud varṇyam vīrya vivarddhanam ca ruci kṛt puṣṭi pradam tarpaṇam
anyaḥ madhujambīraḥ madhujambhaḥ madhurajambhalaḥ ca eva

original: śaṅkhadrāvī śarkarakaḥ pittadrāvī ca ṣaṭsaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_11.177
śoṣaghnas tarpaṇo vṛṣyaḥ śramaghnaḥ puṣṭikārakaḥ // Rajni_11.178
mālūras tu kapittho maṅgalyo nīlamallikā ca dadhi /
analyzed: mālūraḥ tu kapitthaḥ maṅgalyaḥ nīlamallikā ca dadhi

original: grāhiphalaś cirapākī granthiphalaḥ kucaphalo dadhiphalaś ca // Rajni_11.179
analyzed: grāhiphalaḥ cirapākī granthiphalaḥ kucaphalaḥ dadhiphalaḥ ca

original: gandhaphalaś ca kapīṣṭo vṛttaphalaḥ karabhavallabhaś caiva /
analyzed: gandhaphalaḥ ca kapīṣṭaḥ vṛttaphalaḥ karabhavallabhaḥ ca eva

original: dantaśaṭhaḥ kaṭhinaphalaḥ karaṇḍaphalakaś ca saptadaśasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_11.180
analyzed: dantaśaṭhaḥ kaṭhinaphalaḥ karaṇḍaphalakaḥ ca saptadaśa saṃjñaḥ
kapitthaḥ madhura amlaḥ ca kaṣāyaḥ tikta śītalaḥ

original: vṛṣyaḥ pittānilaṃ hanti saṃgrāhī vraṇanāśanaḥ // Rajni_11.181
analyzed: vṛṣyaḥ pitta anilam hanti saṃgrāhī vraṇa nāśanaḥ

original: āmaṃ kapittham amloṣṇāṃ kaphaghnaṃ grāhi vātalam /
analyzed: āmam kapittham amla uṣṇām kapha ghnam grāhi vātalam

original: āmaṃ kaṇṭharujaṃ kapittham adhikaṃ jihvājaḍatvāvahaṃ tad doṣatrayavardhanaṃ viṣaharaṃ saṃgrāhakaṃ rocakam /
analyzed: āmam kaṇṭha rujam kapittham adhikam jihvā jaḍa tva āvaham tat doṣatraya vardhanam viṣa haram saṃgrāhakam rocakam

original: pakvaṃ śvāsavamiśramaklamaharaṃ hikkāpanodakṣamaṃ sarvaṃ grāhi rucipradaṃ ca kathitaṃ sevyaṃ tataḥ sarvadā // Rajni_11.183
analyzed: pakvam śvāsa vami śrama klama haram hikkā apanoda kṣamam sarvam grāhi ruci pradam ca kathitam sevyam tatas sarvadā

original: tumbaruḥ saurabhaḥ sauro vanajaḥ sānujo dvijaḥ /
analyzed: tumbaruḥ saurabhaḥ sauraḥ vanajaḥ sānujaḥ dvijaḥ

original: sphuṭaphalaḥ sugandhiś ca sa prokto dvādaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.184

analyzed: tumbaruḥ madhuraḥ tiktaḥ kaṭu uṣṇaḥ kapha vāta nud

original: rudrākṣaś ca śivākṣaś ca śarvākṣo bhūtanāśanaḥ /
analyzed: rudrākṣaḥ ca śivākṣaḥ ca śarvākṣaḥ bhūtanāśanaḥ

original: pāvano nīlakaṇṭhākṣo harākṣaś ca śivapriyaḥ // Rajni_11.186
rudrākṣam amlam uṣṇaṃ ca vātaghnaṃ kaphanāśanam /
bilvaḥ śalyo hṛdyagandhaḥ śalāṭuḥ śāṇḍilyaḥ syāc chrīphalaḥ karkaṭāhvaḥ /
śailūṣaḥ syāc chaivapatraḥ śiveṣṭaḥ patraśreṣṭho gandhapatras tripattraḥ // Rajni_11.188
analyzed: śailūṣaḥ syāt śaivapatraḥ śiveṣṭaḥ patraśreṣṭhaḥ gandhapatraḥ tripattraḥ

original: lakṣmīphalo gandhaphalo durāruhas triśākapattras triśikhaḥ śivadrumaḥ /
sadāphalaḥ satphaladaḥ subhūtikaḥ samīrasāraḥ śikhinetrasaṃjñitaḥ // Rajni_11.189
bilvas tu madhuro hṛdyaḥ kaṣāyaḥ pittajit guruḥ /
phalaṃ tu komalaṃ snigdhaṃ guru saṃgrāhi dīpanam // Rajni_11.191
analyzed: phalam tu komalam snigdham guru saṃgrāhi dīpanam

original: tad eva pakvaṃ vijñeyaṃ madhuraṃ sarasaṃ guru /
analyzed: tat eva pakvam vijñeyam madhuram sa rasam guru
kaṭu tikta kaṣāya uṣṇam saṃgrāhi ca tridoṣa jit

original: surabhir gajabhakṣyā ca suvahā gajavallabhā // Rajni_11.193
analyzed: surabhiḥ gajabhakṣyā ca suvahā gajavallabhā

original: hṛdyā kuṇṭarikā caiva proktā tryasraphalā ca sā /

analyzed: sallakī tikta madhurā kaṣāyā grāhiṇī parā

original: rucyas tu chedanīyaś ca jñeyo guḍaphalaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tu   ca

original: proktaḥ kataphalas tiktamarīcaś ca navāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.196

analyzed: ruci kṛt śūla doṣa ghnaḥ bījam ambu prasādanam

original: karkaṭaḥ kārkaṭaḥ karkaḥ kṣudradhātrī ca sa smṛtaḥ /
kṣudrāmalakasaṃjñaś ca proktaḥ karkaphalaś ca ṣaṭ // Rajni_11.198
analyzed: kṣudrāmalaka saṃjñaḥ ca proktaḥ karkaphalaḥ ca ṣaṣ

original: kārkaṭaṃ tu phalaṃ rucyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ dīpanaṃ param /
kaphapittaharaṃ grāhi cakṣuṣyaṃ laghu śītalam // Rajni_11.199
śleṣmātakaḥ kaṭuhimo madhuraḥ kaṣāyaḥ svāduś ca pācanakaraḥ krimiśūlahārī /
analyzed: śleṣmātakaḥ kaṭu himaḥ madhuraḥ kaṣāyaḥ svāduḥ ca pācana karaḥ krimi śūla hārī
āma asra doṣa mala rodha bahu vraṇa ārti visphoṭa śānti karaṇaḥ kapha kārakaḥ ca
bhūśeluḥ laghuśeluḥ ca picchalaḥ laghu pūrvakaḥ

original: laghuśītaḥ sūkṣmaphalo laghubhūtadrumaś ca saḥ // Rajni_11.202
muṣkako mocako muṣko mokṣako muñcakas tathā /

analyzed: gaulikaḥ mehanaḥ ca eva kṣāravṛkṣaḥ ca pāṭaliḥ

analyzed: tat sarvam nāśayet śīghram śūlam bhūta ādi doṣa jam

original: siddhāḥ pāradam abhrakaṃ ca vividhān dhātūṃś ca lohāni ca prāhuḥ kiṃca maṇīnapīha sakalān saṃskārataḥ siddhidān /
analyzed: siddhāḥ pāradam abhrakam ca vividhān dhātūn ca lohāni ca prāhuḥ kiṃca maṇīn api iha sakalān saṃskārataḥ siddhi dān

original: yat saṃskāravihīnam eṣu hi bhaved yaccānyathā saṃskṛtaṃ tanmartyaṃ viṣavan nihanti tadiha jñeyā budhaiḥ saṃskriyāḥ // Rajni_13.217
analyzed: yat saṃskāra vihīnam eṣu hi bhavet yat ca anyathā saṃskṛtam tat martyam viṣa vat nihanti tat iha jñeyāḥ budhaiḥ saṃskriyāḥ

original: yaḥ pānīyaṃ pibati śiśiraṃ svādu nityaṃ niśīthe pratyūṣe vā pibati yadi vā ghrāṇarandhreṇa dhīraḥ /

analyzed: grīṣme cauḍam tu seveta doṣa dam syāt atas nyathā

original: taptaṃ divā jāḍyam upaiti naktaṃ naktaṃ ca taptaṃ tu divā guru syāt /
analyzed: taptam divā jāḍyam upaiti naktam naktam ca taptam tu divā guru syāt

original: divā ca naktaṃ ca nṛbhis tadātvataptaṃ jalaṃ yuktamato grahītum // Rajni_14.62
analyzed: divā ca naktam ca nṛbhiḥ tadātva taptam jalam yuktam atas grahītum

original: uṣṇaṃ kvāpi kvāpi śītaṃ kavoṣṇaṃ kvāpi kvāpi kvāthaśītaṃ ca pāthaḥ /
analyzed: uṣṇam kvāpi kvāpi śītam kavoṣṇam kvāpi kvāpi kvātha śītam ca pāthaḥ

original: itthaṃ nṝṇāṃ pathyametat prayuktaṃ kālāvasthādehasaṃsthānurodhāt // Rajni_14.63
analyzed: ittham nṝṇām pathyam etat prayuktam kāla avasthā deha saṃstha anurodhāt
apanayati pavana doṣam dalayati kapham āśu nāśayati arucim

original: pācayati cānnamanalaṃ puṣṇāti niśīthapītam uṣṇāmbhaḥ // Rajni_14.64
analyzed: pācayati ca annam analam puṣṇāti niśītha pītam uṣṇa ambhaḥ

original: rātrau pītamajīrṇadoṣaśamanaṃ śaṃsanti sāmānyataḥ pītaṃ vāri niśāvasānasamaye sarvāmayadhvaṃsanam /
analyzed: rātrau pītam ajīrṇa doṣa śamanam śaṃsanti sāmānyatas pītam vāri niśā avasāna samaye sarva āmaya dhvaṃsanam

original: bhuktvā tūrdhvamidaṃ ca puṣṭijananaṃ prāk ced apuṣṭipradaṃ rucyaṃ jāṭharavahnipāṭavakaraṃ pathyaṃ ca bhuktyantare // Rajni_14.65
analyzed: bhuktvā tu ūrdhvam idam ca puṣṭi jananam prāk ced apuṣṭi pradam rucyam jāṭhara vahni pāṭava karam pathyam ca bhukti antare

original: atyambupānānna vipacyate 'nnam anambupānācca sa eva doṣaḥ /
analyzed: ati ambu pānāt na vipacyate nnam an ambu pānāt ca saḥ eva doṣaḥ

original: tasmānnaro vahnivivardhanārthaṃ muhur muhur vāri pibed abhūri // Rajni_14.66
analyzed: tasmāt naraḥ vahni vivardhana artham muhur muhur vāri pibet abhūri
jalam caturvidham prāhuḥ antarikṣa udbhavam budhāḥ

original: dhāraṃ ca kārakaṃ caiva tauṣāraṃ haimamityapi // Rajni_14.67
analyzed: dhāram ca kārakam ca eva tauṣāram haimam iti api
ambu varṣa udbhavam dhāram kāram varṣopala udbhavam
nīhāra toyam tauṣāram haimam prātar hima udbhavam
dhāram ca dvividham proktam gāṅga sāmudra bhedataḥ

original: tatra gāṅgaṃ guṇāḍhyaṃ syāt adoṣaṃ pācanaṃ param // Rajni_14.69
analyzed: tatra gāṅgam guṇa āḍhyam syāt adoṣam pācanam param
yadā syāt āśvine māsi sūryaḥ svāti viśākhayoḥ
tadā ambu jaladaiḥ muktam gāṅgam uktam manīṣibhiḥ
anyadā mṛgaśīrṣa ādi nakṣatreṣu yat ambudaiḥ
abhivṛṣṭam idam toyam sāmudram iti śabditam
dhārādhare varṣati raupya pātre vinyasya śālyodana siddha piṇḍe

original: dadhnopadigdhe nihitaṃ muhūrtād avikriyaṃ gāṅgam athānyathā syāt // Rajni_14.72
analyzed: dadhnā upadigdhe nihitam muhūrtāt avikriyam gāṅgam atha anyathā syāt

original: gāṅgaṃ jalaṃ svādu suśītalaṃ ca rucipradaṃ pittakaphāpahaṃ ca /
analyzed: gāṅgam jalam svādu su śītalam ca ruci pradam pitta kapha apaham ca

original: nirdoṣam acchaṃ laghu tacca nityaṃ guṇādhikaṃ vyomni gṛhītam āhuḥ // Rajni_14.73
analyzed: nirdoṣam accham laghu tat ca nityam guṇa adhikam vyomni gṛhītam āhuḥ
mūrchā pittāsra dāheṣu hitam kāsa madātyaye
citrāyām āśvine tat ca guṇa āḍhyam gāṅga vat bhavet

original: patitaṃ bhuvi yattoyaṃ gāṅgaṃ sāmudrameva vā /
analyzed: patitam bhuvi yat toyam gāṅgam sāmudram eva vā

original: svasvāśrayavaśād gacched anyad anyad rasādikam // Rajni_14.76
analyzed: sva sva āśraya vaśāt gacchet anyat anyat rasa ādikam

original: asraṃ ca lavaṇaṃ ca syātpatitaṃ pārthivasthale /
analyzed: asram ca lavaṇam ca syāt patitam pārthiva sthale

original: āpye tu madhuraṃ proktaṃ kaṭu tiktaṃ ca taijase // Rajni_14.77
analyzed: āpye tu madhuram proktam kaṭu tiktam ca taijase
kaṣāyam vāyavīye syāt avyaktam nābhase smṛtam
tatra nābhasam eva uktam uttamam doṣa varjitam

original: yatra cedāśvine māsi naiva varṣati vāridaḥ /
analyzed: yatra ced āśvine māsi na eva varṣati vāridaḥ

original: gāṅgatoyavihīne syuḥ kāle tatrādhikā rujaḥ // Rajni_14.79
analyzed: gāṅga toya vihīne syuḥ kāle tatra adhikāḥ rujaḥ
kvacid uṣṇam kvacid śītam kvacid kvathita śītalam
kvacid bheṣaja saṃyuktam na kvacid vāri vāryate
ikṣavaḥ pañcadhā proktāḥ nānā varṇa guṇa anvitāḥ

original: sitaḥ puṇḍraḥ karaṅkekṣuḥ kṛṣṇo raktaśca te kramāt // Rajni_14.81
analyzed: sitaḥ puṇḍraḥ karaṅka ikṣuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ raktaḥ ca te kramāt

original: asipattro madhutṛṇo vṛṣyo guḍatṛṇo nava // Rajni_14.82
analyzed: asipattraḥ madhutṛṇaḥ vṛṣyaḥ guḍatṛṇaḥ nava

original: śvetekṣus tu sitekṣuḥ syāt kāṣṭhekṣur vaṃśapattrakaḥ /
analyzed: tu   syāt
suvaṃśaḥ pāṇḍurekṣuḥ ca kāṇḍekṣuḥ dhavalekṣukaḥ
sitekṣuḥ kaṭhinaḥ rucyaḥ guruḥ ca kapha mūtra kṛt

original: dīpanaḥ pittadāhaghno vipāke koṣṇadaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_14.84
analyzed: dīpanaḥ pitta dāha ghnaḥ vipāke koṣṇa daḥ smṛtaḥ
puṇḍrakaḥ tu rasālaḥ syāt rasekṣuḥ sukumārakaḥ

original: karburo miśravarṇaś ca nepālekṣuś ca saptadhā // Rajni_14.85
analyzed: karburaḥ miśravarṇaḥ ca nepālekṣuḥ ca saptadhā
puṇḍraḥ ti madhuraḥ śītaḥ kapha kṛt pitta nāśanaḥ

original: dāhaśramaharo rucyo rase saṃtarpaṇaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_14.86
analyzed: dāha śrama haraḥ rucyaḥ rase saṃtarpaṇaḥ paraḥ
yāvanī ca ikṣuyoniḥ ca rasālī rasadālikā
karaṅkaśāliḥ madhuraḥ śītalaḥ ruci kṛt mṛduḥ
śyāmavaṃśaḥ śyāmalekṣuḥ kokilekṣuḥ ca kathyate

original: kṛṣṇekṣur ukto madhuraś ca pāke svāduḥ suhṛdyaḥ kaṭuko rasāḍhyaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇekṣuḥ uktaḥ madhuraḥ ca pāke svāduḥ suhṛdyaḥ kaṭukaḥ rasa āḍhyaḥ
tridoṣa hārī śama vīrya daḥ ca su balya dāyī bahu vīrya dāyī
raktekṣuḥ sūkṣmapattraḥ ca śoṇaḥ lohitaḥ utkaṭaḥ
madhuraḥ hrasvamūlaḥ ca lohitekṣuḥ ca kīrtitaḥ
lohitekṣuḥ ca madhuraḥ pāke syāt śītalaḥ mṛduḥ
ikṣumūlam tu ikṣunetram tat ca moraṭakam tathā
mūlāt ūrddhvantu madhurāḥ madhye timadhurāḥ tathā
kramāt lavaṇa nīrasāḥ
a bhukte pitta hāḥ ca ete bhukte vāta prakopaṇāḥ

original: bhuktamadhye gurutarā itīkṣūṇāṃ guṇās trayaḥ // Rajni_14.95
analyzed: bhukta madhye gurutarāḥ iti ikṣūṇām guṇāḥ trayaḥ

original: vṛṣyo raktāsrapittaśramaśamanapaṭuḥ śītalaḥ ślesmado 'lpaḥ snigdho hṛdyaś ca rucyo racayati ca mudaṃ sūtraśuddhiṃ vidhatte /
analyzed: vṛṣyaḥ rakta asra pitta śrama śamana paṭuḥ śītalaḥ ślesma daḥ lpaḥ snigdhaḥ hṛdyaḥ ca rucyaḥ racayati ca mudam sūtra śuddhim vidhatte

original: kāntiṃ dehasya datte balamati kurute bṛṃhaṇaṃ tṛptidāyī dantair niṣpīdya kāṇḍaṃ mṛduyatirasito mohanaś cekṣudaṇḍaḥ // Rajni_14.96
analyzed: kāntim dehasya datte balam ati kurute bṛṃhaṇam tṛpti dāyī dantaiḥ niṣpīdya kāṇḍam mṛdu yatiḥ asitaḥ mohanaḥ ca ikṣu daṇḍaḥ

original: pīyūṣopamitaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ syād dantaniṣpīḍitaṃ tadvacced gṛhayantrajaṃ tadaparaṃ ślesmānilaghnaṃ kiyat /
analyzed: pīyūṣa upamitam tridoṣa śamanam syāt danta niṣpīḍitam tadvat ced gṛhayantra jam tat aparam ślesma anila ghnam kiyat

original: etad vātaharaṃ tu vātajananaṃ jāḍyapratiśvāyadaṃ proktaṃ paryuṣitaṃ kaphānilakaraṃ pānīyam ikṣadbhavam // Rajni_14.97
analyzed: etat vāta haram tu vāta jananam jāḍya pratiśvāya dam proktam paryuṣitam kapha anila karam pānīyam
madhuram lavaṇa kṣāram snigdham sa uṣṇam ruci pradam

original: vṛṣyaṃ vātakaphaghnaṃ ca yāvanālaśarāt rasam // Rajni_14.98
analyzed: vṛṣyam vāta kapha ghnam ca yāvanāla śarāt rasam
pakva ikṣu rasaḥ snigdhaḥ syāt kapha vāta nāśana uti guruḥ
ati pākena vidāham tanute pittāsra doṣa śoṣān ca

original: śiśupriyaḥ sitādiḥ syādaruṇo rasajaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_14.100
pittaghnaḥ pavanārtijid rucikaro hṛdyastridoṣāpahaḥ saṃyogena viśeṣato jvaraharaḥ saṃtāpaśāntipradaḥ /
analyzed: pitta ghnaḥ pavana ārti jit ruci karaḥ hṛdyaḥ tridoṣa apahaḥ saṃyogena viśeṣataḥ jvara haraḥ saṃtāpa śānti pradaḥ

original: viṇmūtrāmayaśodhano'gnijananaḥ pāṇḍupramehāntakaḥ snigdhaḥ svādutaro laghuḥ śramaharaḥ pathyaḥ purāṇo guḍaḥ // Rajni_14.101
analyzed: viṣ mūtra āmaya śodhana ugni jananaḥ pāṇḍu prameha antakaḥ snigdhaḥ svādutaraḥ laghuḥ śrama haraḥ pathyaḥ purāṇaḥ guḍaḥ  /

original: syādyāvanālarasapākabhavo guḍo'yaṃ kṣāraḥ kaṭuḥ sumadhuraḥ kaphavātahārī /
analyzed: syāt yāvanāla rasa pāka bhavaḥ guḍaḥ yam kṣāraḥ kaṭuḥ sumadhuraḥ kapha vāta hārī
pitta pradaḥ satatam eṣa niṣevyamāṇaḥ kaṇḍūti kuṣṭha jananaḥ sravi dāha hārī

original: śarkaroktā tu mīnāṇḍī śvetā matsyaṇḍikā ca sā /
ahicchatrā tu sikatā sitā caiva guḍodbhavā // Rajni_14.103

analyzed: śarkarā madhurā śītā pitta dāha śrama apahā

original: snigdhā puṇḍrakaśarkarā hitakarī kṣīṇe kṣaye'rocake cakṣuṣyā balavardhinī sumadhurā rūkṣā ca vaṃśekṣujā /
analyzed: snigdhā puṇḍraka śarkarā hita karī kṣīṇe kṣaya irocake cakṣuṣyā bala vardhinī sumadhurā rūkṣā ca vaṃśa ikṣu jā

original: vṛṣyā tṛptibalapradā śramaharā śyāmekṣujā śītalā snigdhā kāntikarī rasālajanitā raktekṣujā pittajit // Rajni_14.105
analyzed: vṛṣyā tṛpti bala pradā śrama harā śyāmekṣu jā śītalā snigdhā kānti karī rasāla janitā raktekṣu jā pitta jit  /
vāta ghnī sārikā rucyā dāha pittāsra dāyinī
sitākhaṇḍā uti madhuraḥ cakṣuṣyaḥ chardi nāśanaḥ
tavarājaḥ ti madhuraḥ pitta śrama tṛṣā apahaḥ

original: dāhaṃ nivārayati tāpamapākaroti tṛptiṃ niyacchati nihanti ca mohamūrchām /
analyzed: dāham nivārayati tāpam apākaroti tṛptim niyacchati nihanti ca moha mūrchām

original: śvāsaṃ nivārayati tarpayatīndriyāṇi śītaḥ sadā sumadhuraḥ khalu siddhikhaṇḍaḥ // Rajni_14.113
analyzed: śvāsam nivārayati tarpayati indriyāṇi śītaḥ sadā sumadhuraḥ khalu siddhikhaṇḍaḥ

original: madhu kṣaudraṃ ca mākṣīkaṃ mākṣikaṃ kusumāsavam /
analyzed: madhu kṣaudram ca mākṣīkam mākṣikam kusumāsavam

original: puṣpāsavaṃ pavitraṃ ca pitryaṃ puṣparasāhvayam // Rajni_14.114
mākṣikaṃ bhrāmaraṃ kṣaudraṃ pauttikaṃ chāttrakaṃ tathā /

analyzed: ārghyam auddālakam dālam iti aṣṭau madhu jātayaḥ
nānā puṣpa rasa āhārāḥ kapilāḥ vanamakṣikāḥ
yāḥ sthūlāḥ tābhiḥ utpannam madhu mākṣikam ucyate
ye snigdha añjana gola ābhāḥ puṣpa āsava parāyaṇāḥ

original: bhramarairjanitaṃ taistu bhrāmaraṃ madhu bhaṇyate // Rajni_14.117
analyzed: bhramaraiḥ janitam taiḥ tu bhrāmaram madhu bhaṇyate

original: piṅgalā makṣikāḥ sūkṣmāḥ kṣudrā iti hi viśrutāḥ /
analyzed: piṅgalāḥ makṣikāḥ sūkṣmāḥ kṣudrāḥ iti hi viśrutāḥ

original: tābhirutpāditaṃ yattu tat kṣaudraṃ madhu kathyate // Rajni_14.118
analyzed: tābhiḥ utpāditam yat tu tat kṣaudram madhu kathyate

original: annajā makṣikāḥ piṅgāḥ puttikā iti kīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: anna jāḥ makṣikāḥ piṅgāḥ puttikāḥ iti kīrtitāḥ

original: tajjātaṃ madhu dhīmadbhiḥ pauttikaṃ samudāhṛtam // Rajni_14.119
analyzed: tad jātam madhu dhīmadbhiḥ pauttikam samudāhṛtam
chattra ākāram tu paṭalam saraghāḥ pīta piṅgalāḥ

original: yatkurvanti tadutpannaṃ madhu chāttrakam īritam // Rajni_14.120
analyzed: yat kurvanti tat utpannam madhu chāttrakam īritam

original: tadudbhūtaṃ yadarghārhaṃ tadārghyaṃ madhu varṇyate // Rajni_14.121
analyzed: tat udbhūtam yat arghārham tat ārghyam madhu varṇyate

original: auddālāḥ kapilāḥ kīṭā bhūmer uddalanāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: auddālāḥ kapilāḥ kīṭāḥ bhūmeḥ uddalanāḥ smṛtāḥ
valmīka antar tat utpannam auddālakam udīryate
indranīla dala ākārāḥ sūkṣmāḥ cinvanti makṣikāḥ
yat vṛkṣa koṭara antastham madhu dālam idam smṛtam
iti etasya aṣṭadhā bhedaiḥ utpattiḥ kathitā kramāt

original: atha vakṣyāmyahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇavīryādikaṃ kramāt // Rajni_14.124
analyzed: atha vakṣyāmi aham teṣām varṇa vīrya ādikam kramāt
mākṣikam taila varṇam syāt śvetam bhrāmaram ucyate

original: kṣaudraṃ tu kapilābhāsaṃ pauttikaṃ ghṛtasaṃnibham // Rajni_14.125
analyzed: kṣaudram tu kapila ābhāsam pauttikam ghṛta saṃnibham
āpīta varṇam chāttram syāt piṅgam ca arghya nāmakam
auddālam svarṇa sadṛśam āpītam dālam ucyate

original: bhrāmaraṃ picchilaṃ rūkṣaṃ madhuraṃ mukhajāḍyajit // Rajni_14.127
analyzed: bhrāmaram picchilam rūkṣam madhuram mukhajāḍya jit

original: kṣaudraṃ tu śītaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ picchilaṃ pittavātahṛt /

analyzed: śvitra meha krimi ghnam ca vidyāt chāttram guṇa uttaram
ārghya madhu ati cakṣuṣyam kapha pitta ādi doṣa hṛt
auddālakam tu kuṣṭha ādi doṣa ghnam sarva siddhi dam

original: dālaṃ kaṭu kaṣāyāmlaṃ madhuraṃ pittadāyi ca // Rajni_14.130
analyzed: dālam kaṭu kaṣāya amlam madhuram pitta dāyi ca

original: navaṃ madhu bhavet sthaulyaṃ nātiśleṣmakaraṃ param /
analyzed: navam madhu bhavet sthaulyam na ati śleṣma karam param

original: dehasthaulyāpahaṃ grāhi purāṇaṃ madhu lekhanam // Rajni_14.131
analyzed: deha sthaulya apaham grāhi purāṇam madhu lekhanam

original: pakvaṃ doṣatrayaghnaṃ madhu vividharujājāḍyajihvāmayādidhvaṃsaṃ dhatte ca rucyaṃ balamatidhṛtidaṃ vīryavṛddhiṃ vidhatte /
analyzed: pakvam doṣatraya ghnam madhu vividha rujā jāḍya jihvā āmaya ādi dhvaṃsam dhatte ca rucyam balam atidhṛti dam vīrya vṛddhim vidhatte

original: āmaṃ ced āmagulmāmayapavanarujāpittadāhāsradoṣaṃ hanyād vātaṃ ca śoṣaṃ janayati niyataṃ dhvaṃsayaty antavṛddhim // Rajni_14.132
analyzed: āmam ced āma gulma āmaya pavana rujā pitta dāha asra doṣam hanyāt vātam ca śoṣam janayati niyatam dhvaṃsayati anta vṛddhim
vraṇa śodhana saṃdhāne vraṇa saṃropaṇa ādiṣu

original: sādhāraṇyā madhu hitaṃ tattulyā madhuśarkarā // Rajni_14.133
analyzed: sādhāraṇyā madhu hitam tad tulyā madhuśarkarā
uṣṇaiḥ saha uṣṇa kāle vā svayam uṣṇam atha api vā

original: āmaṃ madhu manuṣyāṇāṃ viṣavat tāpadāyakam // Rajni_14.134
analyzed: āmam madhu manuṣyāṇām viṣavat tāpa dāyakam
kīṭaka ādi yutam amla dūṣitam yat ca paryuṣitakam madhu svatas

original: kaṇṭakoṭaragataṃ ca mecakaṃ tacca gehajanitaṃ ca doṣakṛt // Rajni_14.135
analyzed: kaṇṭa koṭara gatam ca mecakam tat ca geha janitam ca doṣa kṛt

original: daṇḍair nihatya yadupāttamapāstadaṃśaṃ tādṛgvidhaṃ madhu rasāyanayogayogyam /
analyzed: daṇḍaiḥ nihatya yat upāttam apāsta daṃśam tādṛgvidham madhu rasāyana yoga yogyam
hikkā gudāṅkura viśopha kapha vraṇa ādi doṣa apaham bhavati doṣa dam anyathā ced
mākṣīkaśarkarā ca eṣā kṣaudrajā kṣaudraśarkarā

original: yadguṇaṃ yanmadhu proktaṃ tadguṇā tasya śarkarā /
analyzed: yad guṇam yat madhu proktam tad guṇā tasya śarkarā

original: viśeṣād balavṛṣyaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ kṣīṇadehinām // Rajni_14.138
analyzed: viśeṣāt bala vṛṣyam ca tarpaṇam kṣīṇa dehinām

original: madyaṃ surā prasannā syānmadirā vāruṇī varā /
analyzed: madyam surā prasannā syāt madirā vāruṇī varā

original: mattā kādambarī śītā capalā kāminī priyā // Rajni_14.139
madagandhā ca mādhvīkaṃ madhu saṃdhānam āsavaḥ /
analyzed: mada gandhā ca mādhvīkam madhu saṃdhānam āsavaḥ

original: vargastasya vrajati nṛharer nāmanirmāṇanāmnaś cūḍāratne khalu tithimitaḥ kṣīrakādiḥ samāptim // Rajni_15.131
analyzed: vargaḥ tasya vrajati nṛhareḥ nāma nirmāṇa nāmnaḥ cūḍāratne khalu tithi mitaḥ kṣīraka ādiḥ samāptim
rājanighaṇṭu
śāli ādi varga
dhānyam bhogyam ca bhogārham annādyam jīvasādhanam

original: tacca tāvat tridhā jñeyaṃ śūkaśimbītṛṇāhvayam // Rajni_16.1
analyzed: tat ca tāvat tridhā jñeyam śūka śimbī tṛṇa āhvayam

original: vrīhyādikaṃ yadiha śūkasamanvitaṃ syāt tacchūkadhānyam atha mudgamakuṣṭakādi /
analyzed: vrīhi ādikam yat iha śūka samanvitam syāt tat śūkadhānyam atha mudga makuṣṭaka ādi

original: śimbīnigūḍham iti tat pravadanti śimbīdhānyaṃ tṛṇodbhavatayā tṛṇadhānyam anyat // Rajni_16.2
analyzed: śimbī nigūḍham iti tat pravadanti śimbīdhānyam tṛṇodbhavatayā tṛṇadhānyam anyat

original: śimbībhavaṃ guru himaṃ ca vibandhadāyi vātūlakaṃ tu śiśiraṃ tṛṇadhānyam āhuḥ // Rajni_16.3
analyzed: śimbī bhavam guru himam ca vibandha dāyi vātūlakam tu śiśiram tṛṇadhānyam āhuḥ

original: deśe deśe śūkadhānyeṣu saṃkhyā jñātuṃ śakyā naiva taddaivatairvā /
analyzed: deśe deśe śūkadhānyeṣu saṃkhyā jñātum śakyā na eva tat daivataiḥ vā

original: tasmād eṣāṃ yeṣu bhogopayogās tānyasmābhir vyākriyante kiyanti // Rajni_16.4
analyzed: tasmāt eṣām yeṣu bhoga upayogāḥ tāni asmābhiḥ vyākriyante kiyanti
śālayaḥ kalamāḥ rucyāḥ vrīhiśreṣṭhāḥ nṛpapriyāḥ

original: dhānyottamāś ca vijñeyāḥ kaidārāḥ sukumārakāḥ // Rajni_16.5
analyzed: dhānyottamāḥ ca vijñeyāḥ kaidārāḥ sukumārakāḥ

original: vrīhis tatheti daśadhā bhuvi śālayastu teṣāṃ krameṇa guṇanāmagaṇaṃ bravīmi // Rajni_16.6
analyzed: vrīhiḥ tathā iti daśadhā bhuvi śālayaḥ tu teṣām krameṇa guṇa nāma gaṇam bravīmi

original: rājānnaṃ dīrghaśūkaḥ kharipudivasajaṃ ṣaṣṭiko varṇato dvau niḥśūko muṇḍaśāliḥ svaguṇaviśaditaḥ svābhidhānāstrayo'nye /
analyzed: rājānnam dīrghaśūkaḥ kharipudivasajam ṣaṣṭikaḥ varṇataḥ dvau niḥśūkaḥ muṇḍaśāliḥ sva guṇa viśaditaḥ sva abhidhānāḥ trayonye

original: māsair yo 'nyas tribhiḥ syāt sa bhavati nirapo yo 'pi vṛṣṭyambusambhūr eṣa syādvrīhisaṃjñastaditi daśavidhāḥ śālayastu prasiddhāḥ // Rajni_16.7
analyzed: māsaiḥ yaḥ nyaḥ tribhiḥ syāt sa bhavati nirapaḥ vṛṣṭi ambu sambhūḥ eṣa syāt vrīhi saṃjñaḥ tat iti daśavidhāḥ śālayaḥ tu prasiddhāḥ
śāliḥ nṛpānnam rājānnam rājārham dīrghaśūkakam

original: rājānnaṃ tu tridoṣaghnaṃ susnigdhaṃ madhuraṃ laghu /

analyzed: dīpanam bala kṛt pathyam kānti dam vīrya vardhanam

original: rājānnaṃ trividhaṃ svaśūkabhidayā jñeyaṃ sitaṃ lohitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ceti rasādhikaṃ ca tadidaṃ syād auttarottaryataḥ /
analyzed: rājānnam trividham sva śūka bhidayā jñeyam sitam lohitam kṛṣṇam ca iti rasa adhikam ca tat idam syāt auttarottaryataḥ

original: traividhyādiha taṇḍulāś ca haritāḥ śvetāstathā lohitāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti te 'pyatha guṇaiḥ syuḥ pūrvapūrvottarāḥ // Rajni_16.10
analyzed: traividhyāt iha taṇḍulāḥ ca haritāḥ śvetāḥ tathā lohitāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti te guṇaiḥ syuḥ pūrva pūrva uttarāḥ
ṣaṣṭikaḥ ṣaṣṭiśāliḥ syāt ṣaṣṭijaḥ snigdha taṇḍulaḥ
ṣaṣṭi vāsara jaḥ saḥ yam jñeyaḥ māsa dvaya udbhavaḥ

original: gauro nīlaḥ ṣaṣṭiko'yaṃ dvidhā syād ādyo rucyaḥ śītalo doṣahārī /
analyzed: gauraḥ nīlaḥ ṣaṣṭikaḥ yam dvidhā syāt ādyaḥ rucyaḥ śītalaḥ doṣa hārī

original: balyaḥ pathyo dīpano vīryavṛddhiṃ datte cāsmāt kiṃcid ūno dvitīyaḥ // Rajni_16.12
analyzed: balyaḥ pathyaḥ dīpanaḥ vīrya vṛddhim datte ca asmāt kiṃcid ūnaḥ dvitīyaḥ
varṇa kānti karaḥ balyaḥ dāha jit vīrya vṛddhi kṛt
raktaśāliḥ tāmraśāliḥ śoṇaśāliḥ ca lohitaḥ

original: raktaśāliḥ sumadhuro laghuḥ snigdho balāvahaḥ // Rajni_16.15
analyzed: raktaśāliḥ sumadhuraḥ laghuḥ snigdhaḥ bala āvahaḥ
ruci kṛt dīpanaḥ pathyaḥ mukhajāḍya rujā apahaḥ
sarva āmaya haraḥ rucyaḥ pitta dāha anila asra jit
sthūlaśāliḥ mahāśāliḥ sthūlāṅgaḥ sthūlataṇḍulaḥ
evam gandha āḍhya śāleḥ ca nāmāni ūhyāni sūribhiḥ

original: mahāśāliḥ svādurmadhuraśiśiraḥ pittaśamano jvaraṃ jīrṇaṃ dāhaṃ jaṭhararujam ahnāya śamayet /
analyzed: mahāśāliḥ svāduḥ madhura śiśiraḥ pitta śamanaḥ jvaram jīrṇam dāham jaṭhara rujam ahne śamayet

original: śiśūnāṃ yūnāṃ vā yadapi jaratāṃ vā hitakaraḥ sadā sevyaḥ sarvair analabalavīryāṇi kurute // Rajni_16.20
analyzed: śiśūnām yūnām vā yat api jaratām vā hita karaḥ sadā sevyaḥ sarvaiḥ anala bala vīryāṇi kurute
sūkṣmaśāliḥ sūciśāliḥ potaśāliḥ ca sūcakaḥ
dīpanaḥ pācanaḥ ca eva kiṃcid vāta vikāra jit
sugandhiḥ gandha bahulaḥ surabhiḥ gandhataṇḍulaḥ
stanyaḥ tu garbha sthiratā alpa vāta daḥ puṣṭi pradaḥ ca alpa kaphaḥ ca balya daḥ
nirapaḥ madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ śītalaḥ dāha pitta jit
tridoṣa śamanaḥ rucyaḥ pathyaḥ sarva āmaya apanud

original: vrīhir gauro madhuraśiśiraḥ pittahārī kaṣāyaḥ snigdho vṛṣyaḥ kṛmikaphaharas tāparaktāpahaś ca /
analyzed: vrīhiḥ gauraḥ madhura śiśiraḥ pitta hārī kaṣāyaḥ snigdhaḥ vṛṣyaḥ kṛmi kapha haraḥ tāpa rakta apahaḥ ca

original: puṣṭiṃ datte śramaśamanakṛd vīryavṛddhiṃ vidhatte rucyo 'tyantaṃ janayati mudaṃ vātakṛnmecako 'nyaḥ // Rajni_16.26
analyzed: puṣṭim datte śrama śamana kṛt vīrya vṛddhim vidhatte rucyaḥ tyantam janayati mudam vāta kṛt mecakaḥ

original: maṇḍakaḥ sthūlaśāliś ca syād bimbaśālikas tathā /

analyzed: ca bimbī kausendukaḥ tathā

original: rājānāṃ maulikasyāpi śāliḥ syād urvarī tathā // Rajni_16.28

vanaśāliḥ guṇḍurūkī kṣīrikā paṅktayaḥ pṛthak
etāni śāli nāmāni prakhyātāni prasiddhataḥ

analyzed: vrīhisaṃdhānyam uddiṣṭaḥ ardhadhānyaḥ tu vrīhikaḥ

original: sudhānyaṃ pathyakārī ca mupaviḥ prajñavipriyaḥ // Rajni_16.31
analyzed: sudhānyam pathyakārī ca mupaviḥ prajña vipriyaḥ
śāliḥ tu kalama ādyaḥ tu kalamaḥ nākalāyakaḥ

analyzed: raktāṅgulam sukāram ca kuṅkumam samavarṇajā

analyzed: madhurā ca sugandhā ca tilavāsī nigadyate

analyzed: tilanī tilaparṇī ca āmagandhā pravāsinī

komala āhāra sambhūtāḥ tilavāsī mahā guṇāḥ

original: kalāṭakaḥ kavilaḥ syād guruso garuḍaḥ smṛtaḥ /

grahaṇī gulma kuṣṭha ghnaḥ vikalaḥ bhojane śubhaḥ

analyzed: saurabham śuṇḍikaḥ śuṇḍī kausumbhī kaṭhinaḥ phalaḥ

analyzed: kiṃcid sa tiktāḥ madhurāḥ pācanāḥ bala vardhanāḥ
kedārāḥ madhurāḥ vṛṣyāḥ balyāḥ pitta vivardhanāḥ

jūnalaḥ puṣpagandhaḥ ca sugandhaḥ segurundakaḥ

original: sa raktayāvanālo hitalohitas tuvaradhānyaś ca // Rajni_16.63

original: śiśiro madhuro vṛṣyo doṣaghno balapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_16.65

original: māṣaḥ snigdho bahumalakaraḥ śoṣaṇaḥ śleṣmakārī vīryeṇoṣṇo jhaṭiti kurute raktapittaprakopam /

original: hanyādvātaṃ gurubalakaro rocano bhakṣyamāṇaḥ svādur nityaṃ śramasukhavatāṃ sevanīyo narāṇām // Rajni_16.81

original: īṣad vātakarā rucyā vidalā gurugrāhikā // Rajni_16.101
analyzed: īṣat vāta karā rucyā vidalā guru

original: sā ca śvetā doṣadātrī tu raktā rucyā balyā pittatāpādihantrī /
analyzed: sā ca śvetā doṣa dātrī tu raktā rucyā balyā pitta tāpa ādi hantrī

original: sā śyāmā ced dīpanī pittadāhadhvaṃsā balyaṃ cāḍhakīyūṣam uktam // Rajni_16.102
analyzed: sā śyāmā ced dīpanī pitta dāha dhvaṃsā balyam ca āḍhakī yūṣam uktam

original: kulitthas tāmrabījaś ca śvetabījaḥ sitetaraḥ // Rajni_16.103

analyzed: kulitthaḥ tu kaṣāya uṣṇaḥ rūkṣaḥ vāta kapha apahaḥ

original: sukumāro vṛttabījo madhuraḥ kṣavakaśca saḥ // Rajni_16.105

original: palaṃkaṣā sthūlaśimbī vṛttā madhusitā sitā // Rajni_16.107

original: vātalaḥ kaphado rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyo viṣadoṣanut // Rajni_16.110
analyzed: vātalaḥ kapha daḥ rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyaḥ viṣa doṣa nud

original: pāpaghnaḥ pūtadhānyaṃ ca jaṭilastu vanodbhavaḥ // Rajni_16.111
analyzed: pāpaghnaḥ pūtadhānyam ca jaṭilaḥ tu vanodbhavaḥ

original: snigdho varṇabalāgnivṛddhijananastanyānilaghno guruḥ soṣṇaḥ pittakaro'lpamūtrakaraṇaḥ keśyo 'tipathyo vraṇe /
analyzed: snigdhaḥ varṇa bala agni vṛddhi janana stanya anila ghnaḥ guruḥ sa uṣṇaḥ pitta kara ulpa mūtra karaṇaḥ keśyaḥ tipathyaḥ vraṇe

original: saṃgrāhī madhuraḥ kaṣāyasahitastikto vipāke kaṭuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pathyatamaḥ sito'lpaguṇadaḥ kṣīṇās tathānye tilāḥ // Rajni_16.112
analyzed: saṃgrāhī madhuraḥ kaṣāya sahitaḥ tiktaḥ vipāke kaṭuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pathyatamaḥ sita ulpa guṇa daḥ kṣīṇāḥ tathā anye tilāḥ

original: palalaṃ tilakalkaṃ syāttilacūrṇaṃ ca piṣṭakam // Rajni_16.113
analyzed: palalam tila kalkam syāt tilacūrṇam ca piṣṭakam

analyzed: umā kṣumā haimavatī sunīlā nīlapuṣpikā
atasī mada gandhā syāt madhurā bala kārikā

original: tīkṣṇagandhā madhurikā kṣavakaḥ kṣuvakaḥ kṣavaḥ // Rajni_16.119

analyzed: āsurī kaṭu tikta uṣṇā vāta plīha ārti śūla nud
dāha pitta pradā hanti kapha gulma kṛmi vraṇān

original: dhānyānāṃ kañcuke śimbī bījaguptiś ca śāmbhavī /
analyzed: dhānyānām kañcuke śimbī bījaguptiḥ ca śāmbhavī

original: tadguptāni ca dhānyāni śimbīdhānyāni cakṣate // Rajni_16.125
analyzed: tad guptāni ca dhānyāni śimbīdhānyāni cakṣate

analyzed: sukumārī rājadhānyam tṛṇabījottamaḥ ca saḥ

original: sa ca deśaviśeṣeṇa nānābhedaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Rajni_16.128
analyzed: sa ca deśa viśeṣeṇa nānā bhedaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: varakaḥ sthūlakaṅguś ca rūkṣaḥ sthūlapriyaṅgukaḥ // Rajni_16.130
analyzed: varakaḥ sthūlakaṅguḥ ca rūkṣaḥ sthūlapriyaṅgukaḥ

original: varako madhuro rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyo vātapittakṛt // Rajni_16.131
analyzed: varakaḥ madhuraḥ rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyaḥ vāta pitta kṛt

original: vātalaḥ sukumāraśca sa ca nānāvidhābhidhaḥ // Rajni_16.132
analyzed: vātalaḥ sukumāraḥ ca sa ca nānāvidha abhidhaḥ
priyaṅguḥ madhuraḥ rucyaḥ kaṣāyaḥ svādu śītalaḥ

original: nīvāro madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ pavitraḥ pathyado laghuḥ // Rajni_16.135
analyzed: nīvāraḥ madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ pavitraḥ pathya daḥ laghuḥ

original: rāgī tu lāñchanaḥ syād bahudalakaṇiśaś ca gucchakaṇiśaś ca // Rajni_16.136
analyzed: rāgī tu lāñchanaḥ syāt bahu dala kaṇiśaḥ ca guccha kaṇiśaḥ ca

original: tikto madhurakaṣāyaḥ śītaḥ pittāsranāśano baladaḥ // Rajni_16.137
analyzed: tiktaḥ madhura kaṣāyaḥ śītaḥ pitta asra nāśanaḥ bala daḥ
kurī tu tṛṇadhānyam syāt madhuram tat bala pradam

original: haritaṃ vārddhakaṃ pakvaṃ vājināṃ puṣṭidāyakam // Rajni_16.138
analyzed: haritam vārddhakam pakvam vājinām puṣṭi dāyakam

original: ye ke ca vrīhayo bhṛṣṭāste lājā iti kīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.139
analyzed: ye ke ca vrīhayaḥ bhṛṣṭāḥ te lājāḥ iti kīrtitāḥ

original: yavādayaśca ye bhṛṣṭā dhānāste parikīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.140
analyzed: yava ādayaḥ ca ye bhṛṣṭāḥ dhānāḥ te parikīrtitāḥ

original: lājā ca yavadhānā ca tarpaṇī pittanāśinī /
analyzed: lājā ca yava dhānā ca tarpaṇī pitta nāśinī
godhūma yāvanāla utthāḥ kiṃcid uṣṇāḥ ca dīpanāḥ

original: ākulā guravo vṛṣyā madhurāḥ balakāriṇaḥ // Rajni_16.142
analyzed: ākulāḥ guravaḥ vṛṣyāḥ madhurāḥ bala kāriṇaḥ

original: vrīhayo 'pyardhapakvāś ca taptās te pṛthukāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: vrīhayaḥ pi ardhapakvāḥ ca taptāḥ te pṛthukāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: pṛthukāḥ svādavaḥ snigdhā hṛdyā madanavardhanāḥ // Rajni_16.143
analyzed: pṛthukāḥ svādavaḥ snigdhāḥ hṛdyāḥ madana vardhanāḥ

original: pūpalā madhurāḥ proktā vṛṣyāste baladāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: pūpalāḥ madhurāḥ proktāḥ vṛṣyāḥ te bala dāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ye cānye yāvanālādyāś cipiṭās taptataṇḍulāḥ // Rajni_16.145

śāleya yāvanālīya cipiṭāḥ puṣṭi vardhanāḥ

original: taptāstu mudgacaṇakāḥ sumanādilaṅkā sadyas tṛṣārtirucipittakṛtaś ca jagdhāḥ /

yat ardha pakvam tat dhānyam viṣṭambha ādhmāna doṣa kṛt

original: sphoṭas tu caṇakādīnāṃ dāl iti parikīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.152

original: pakvaṃ haritalūnaṃ ca dhānyaṃ sarvaguṇāvaham // Rajni_16.153

original: koṣadhānyaṃ navaṃ balyaṃ madhuraṃ vatsaroṣitam // Rajni_16.155

caṇāḥ tu yava godhūma tila māṣāḥ navāḥ hitāḥ

original: dhānyaṃ vāpitamuttamaṃ tadakhilaṃ chinnodbhavaṃ madhyamaṃ jñeyaṃ yadyadavāpitaṃ tadadhamaṃ niḥsāradoṣapradam /

analyzed: dagdhāyām bhuvi yatnataḥ upi vipine ye vāpitāḥ śālayaḥ ye ca chinnabhavāḥ bhavanti khalu te viṣ mūtra bandha pradāḥ
kṣāra udaka samutpannam dhānyam śleṣma rujā apaham

analyzed: tena śrī nṛhari īśvareṇa racite nāma ukti cūḍāmaṇau vargaḥ yam sthitam eti nūtana racanaḥ dhānya āhvayaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ

māṃsa ādi varga

original: palalaṃ jāṅgalaṃ kīram āmiṣaṃ ca tad ucyate // Rajni_17.1
analyzed: palalam jāṅgalam kīram āmiṣam ca tat ucyate

original: sadyohatasya māṃsaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ hariṇādikasya yūnas tu /

analyzed: tyājyam mṛga ādeḥ piśitam tu tasya vigandhi śuṣkam ca cira sthitam ca

original: puṣṭiṃ dīptiṃ ca datte rucikṛdatha laghu svādu sādhāraṇīyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ balyaṃ ca rucyaṃ ruruhariṇamṛgakroḍasāraṅgakāṇām // Rajni_17.5
analyzed: puṣṭim dīptim ca datte ruci kṛt atha laghu svādu sādhāraṇīyam vṛṣyam balyam ca rucyam ruru hariṇa mṛga kroḍa sāraṅgakāṇām

original: māṃsaṃ sārasahaṃsarātrivirahikrauñcādijaṃ śītalaṃ snigdhaṃ vātakaphāpahaṃ guru tataḥ svādu tridoṣāpaham /
analyzed: māṃsam sārasa haṃsa rātri virahi krauñca ādi jam śītalam snigdham vāta kapha apaham guru tatas svādu tridoṣa apaham

original: pathyaṃ lāvakatittirādijanitaṃ vṛṣyaṃ laghu syāt paraṃ cakrakrauñcamayūratittirabhavaṃ deśatrayādīdṛśam // Rajni_17.6
analyzed: pathyam lāvaka tittira ādi janitam vṛṣyam laghu syāt param cakra krauñca mayūra tittira bhavam deśa trayāt īdṛśam

original: druto vilambitaś caiva plavaś ceti gatais trayaḥ /
analyzed: drutaḥ vilambitaḥ ca eva plavaḥ ca iti gataiḥ trayaḥ

original: sthānato 'pi trayas te tu bilasthalajalāśrayāḥ // Rajni_17.7
analyzed: sthānataḥ trayaḥ te tu bila sthala jala āśrayāḥ

original: punaste tu prasahanāḥ pratudā viṣkirā iti /
analyzed: punar te tu prasahanāḥ pratudāḥ viṣkirāḥ iti
svabhāvataḥ trayaḥ proktāḥ kramaśas mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ
atha eṣām kramaśas lakṣma guṇān vakṣyāmi vargaśas

original: evaṃ navavidhāḥ proktās ta eva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Rajni_17.9
analyzed: evam navavidhāḥ proktāḥ te eva mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: ajaśaśahariṇādayaḥ svayaṃ ye drutagamanā drutasaṃjñakāḥ smṛtāste /
analyzed: aja śaśa hariṇa ādayaḥ svayam ye druta gamanāḥ druta saṃjñakāḥ smṛtāḥ te

original: taduditapalalaṃ ca pathyabalyaṃ racayati vīryamadapradaṃ laghu syāt // Rajni_17.10
analyzed: tad udita palalam ca pathya balyam racayati vīrya mada pradam laghu syāt
gaja khaḍga mukhāḥ mahāmṛgāḥ nija gatyā eva vilambitāḥ smṛtāḥ te

original: balakṛtpiśitaṃ ca picchalaṃ kaphakāsānilamāndyadaṃ guru syāt // Rajni_17.11
analyzed: bala kṛt piśitam ca picchalam kapha kāsa anila māndya dam guru syāt

original: plavasaṃjñāḥ kathitāste tanmāṃsaṃ gurūṣṇaṃ ca baladāyi // Rajni_17.12
analyzed: plava saṃjñāḥ kathitāḥ te tad māṃsam guru uṣṇam ca bala dāyi
ahi nakula śalya godhā mūṣaka mukhyāḥ bileśayāḥ kathitāḥ
śvāsa anila kāsa haram tad māṃsam pitta dāha karam
