original: sthaleśayāstu te sarve māṃsaṃ sarvaguṇāvaham // Rajni_17.14
analyzed: sthaleśayāḥ tu te sarve māṃsam sarva guṇa āvaham
jhaṣa makara nakra karkaṭa kūrma pramukhāḥ jaleśayāḥ kathitāḥ

original: māṃsaṃ teṣāṃ tu saraṃ vṛṣyaṃ guru śiśirabalasamīrakaram // Rajni_17.15
analyzed: māṃsam teṣām tu saram vṛṣyam guru śiśira bala samīra karam
śārdūla siṃha śarabha ṛkṣa tarakṣu mukhyāḥ ye nye prasahya vinihanti abhivartayanti

original: te kīrtitāḥ prasahanāḥ palalaṃ tadīyam arśaḥpramehajaṭharāmayajāḍyahāri // Rajni_17.16
analyzed: te kīrtitāḥ prasahanāḥ palalam tadīyam arśaḥ prameha jaṭharāmaya jāḍya hāri  /

original: bhoktā niṣkṛṣyāmiṣaṃ sa pratudaḥ prokto gṛdhraśyenakākādiko yaḥ /
analyzed: bhoktā niṣkṛṣya āmiṣam sa pratudaḥ proktaḥ gṛdhra śyena kāka ādikaḥ yaḥ

original: māṃsaṃ tasya svādu saṃtarpaṇaṃ ca snigdhaṃ balyaṃ pittadāhāsradāyi // Rajni_17.17
analyzed: māṃsam tasya svādu saṃtarpaṇam ca snigdham balyam pitta dāha asra dāyi

original: bhakṣyāśca kukkuṭakapotakatittirādyāḥ kṣauṇīṃ vilikhya nakharaiḥ khalu vartayanti /
analyzed: bhakṣyāḥ ca kukkuṭa kapotaka tittira ādyāḥ kṣauṇīm vilikhya nakharaiḥ khalu vartayanti

original: te viṣkirāḥ prakathitāḥ piśitaṃ tadīyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ kaṣāyamadhuraṃ śiśiraṃ ca rucyam // Rajni_17.18
analyzed: te viṣkirāḥ prakathitāḥ piśitam tadīyam vṛṣyam kaṣāya madhuram śiśiram ca rucyam

original: ayameva guṇo jñeyaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ ca yathākramam /

original: sarvasthānaviśeṣeṇa saṃkhyā ca gatir ucyate // Rajni_17.19

original: yatra sthitā ye gatito 'pi deśādanyatra yātā mṛgapakṣimukhyāḥ /

analyzed: vana mahiṣa āmiṣam syāt īṣat laghu dīpanam ca bala dāyi

analyzed: grāmīṇa mahiṣa māṃsam snigdham nidrā karam ca pitta haram
hasti kravyam guru snigdham vātalam śleṣma

original: rucyaṃ tu vanyajaṃ śaityaṃ bahuvīryabalapradam // Rajni_17.30
analyzed: rucyam tu vanya jam śaityam bahu vīrya bala pradam

analyzed: eṇasya māṃsam laghu śīta vṛṣyam tridoṣa hṛt ṣaṣ rasa jam ca rucyam

analyzed: kuraṅga māṃsam madhuram ca tadvat kapha apaham māṃsa da pitta nāśi

analyzed: sāraṅgam jāṅgalam snigdham madhuram laghu vṛṣyakam

analyzed: śikharīsambhavam māṃsam laghu hṛdyam bala pradam

analyzed: varāha māṃsam guru vāta hāri vṛṣyam bala sveda karam vana uttham

analyzed: īṣat laghu balam datte tat eva tṛṇa cāriṇaḥ

analyzed: picchilam nākulam māṃsam vāta ghnam śleṣma pitta kṛt

original: kaṣāyastuvaraḥ proktaḥ sa tu pūgīphalādiṣu // Rajni_20.80
analyzed: kaṣāyaḥ tuvaraḥ proktaḥ sa tu pūgī phala ādiṣu
amlaḥ tu ciñcā jambīra mātuluṅga phala ādiṣu

original: kaṭustu tīkṣṇasaṃjñaḥ syānmarīcādau sa cekṣyate // Rajni_20.82
analyzed: kaṭuḥ tu tīkṣṇa saṃjñaḥ syāt marīca ādau sa ca īkṣyate
madhuraḥ ca rasaḥ cinoti keśān vapuṣaḥ sthairya bala ojaḥ vīrya dāyī
atisevanataḥ prameha śaityam jaḍatā māndya mukhān karoti doṣān
lavaṇaḥ ruci kṛt rasaḥ gni dāyī pacanaḥ svādu karaḥ ca sārakaḥ ca

original: atisevanato jarāṃ ca pittaṃ sitimānaṃ ca dadāti kuṣṭhakārī // Rajni_20.84
analyzed: atisevanataḥ jarām ca pittam sitimānam ca dadāti kuṣṭha kārī

original: tikto jantūn hanti kuṣṭhaṃ jvarārtiṃ kāsaṃ dāhaṃ dīpano rocanaśca /
analyzed: tiktaḥ jantūn hanti kuṣṭham jvara ārtim kāsam dāham dīpanaḥ rocanaḥ ca

original: martyair gāḍhaṃ pratyahaṃ sevitaścettīvraṃ datte rājayakṣmāṇameṣaḥ // Rajni_20.85
analyzed: martyaiḥ gāḍham pratyaham sevitaḥ ced tīvram datte rājayakṣmāṇam eṣaḥ

original: kaṣāyanāmā niruṇaddhi śophaṃ varṇaṃ tanor dīpanapācanaśca /
analyzed: niruṇaddhi śopham varṇam tanoḥ dīpana pācanaḥ ca

original: sattvāpaho'sau śithilatvakārī niṣevitaḥ pāṇḍu karoti gātram // Rajni_20.86
analyzed: sattva apahā usau śithila tva kārī niṣevitaḥ pāṇḍu karoti gātram

original: amlābhidhaḥ prītikaro rucipradaḥ prapācano 'gneḥ paṭutāṃ ca yacchati /
analyzed: amla abhidhaḥ prīti karaḥ ruci pradaḥ prapācanaḥ gneḥ paṭu tām ca yacchati

original: bhrāntiṃ ca kuṣṭhaṃ kaphapāṇḍutāṃ ca kārṣṇyaṃ ca kāsaṃ kurute'tisevitaḥ // Rajni_20.87
analyzed: bhrāntim ca kuṣṭham kapha pāṇḍu tām ca kārṣṇyam ca kāsam kuruta iti sevitaḥ

original: eṣo'pi datte bahusevitaścet kṣayāvaho vīryabalakṣayaṃ ca // Rajni_20.88
analyzed: eṣaḥ api datte bahu sevitaḥ ced kṣaya āvahaḥ vīrya bala kṣayam ca

original: kaṭuḥ kaṣāyaśca kaphāpahāriṇau mādhuryatiktāv api pittanāśanau /
analyzed: kaṭuḥ kaṣāyaḥ ca kapha apahāriṇau mādhurya tiktau api pitta nāśanau

original: paṭvamlasaṃjñau ca rasau maruddharau itthaṃ dviśo'mī sakalāmayāpahāḥ // Rajni_20.89
analyzed: paṭu amla saṃjñau ca rasau marut harau ittham dvi śomī sakala āmaya apahāḥ

original: anyonyaṃ madhurāmlau lavaṇāmlau kaṭutiktakau ca rasau /
analyzed: anyonyam madhura amlau lavaṇa amlau kaṭu tiktakau ca rasau

original: kaṭulavaṇau ca syātāṃ miśrarasau tiktalavaṇau ca // Rajni_20.90
analyzed: kaṭu lavaṇau ca syātām miśra rasau tikta lavaṇau ca

original: lavaṇamadhurau viruddhāv atha kaṭumadhurau ca tiktamadhurau ca /
analyzed: lavaṇa madhurau viruddhau atha kaṭu madhurau ca tikta madhurau ca

original: sādhāraṇaḥ kaṣāyaḥ sarvatra samānatāṃ dhatte // Rajni_20.91
analyzed: sādhāraṇaḥ kaṣāyaḥ sarvatra samānatām dhatte

original: saṃdhatte madhuro'mlatāṃ ca lavaṇo dhatte yathāvat sthitiṃ tiktākhyaḥ kaṭutāṃ tathā madhuratāṃ dhatte kaṣāyāhvayaḥ /
analyzed: saṃdhatte madhura umla tām ca lavaṇaḥ dhatte yathāvat sthitim tikta ākhyaḥ kaṭu tām tathā madhura tām dhatte kaṣāya āhvayaḥ

original: amlastiktaruciṃ dadāti kaṭuko yāty antatas tiktatām ityeṣāṃ svavipākato 'pi kathitā ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ sthitiḥ // Rajni_20.92
analyzed: amlaḥ tikta rucim dadāti kaṭukaḥ yāti antatas tikta tām iti eṣām kathitā ṣaṇṇām rasānām sthitiḥ

original: kramād anyonyasaṃkīrṇā nānātvaṃ yānti ṣaḍrasāḥ // Rajni_20.93
analyzed: kramāt anyonya saṃkīrṇāḥ nānātvam yānti ṣaṭ rasāḥ

original: caturbhirapi paryāyair ādye proktā bhidā daśa // Rajni_20.95
analyzed: caturbhiḥ api paryāyaiḥ ādye proktāḥ bhidāḥ daśa

original: evaṃ dvitīye ṣaḍbhedās tṛtīye ca trayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: evam dvitīye ṣaṭ bhedāḥ tṛtīye ca trayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: caturthe caika ityete trikabhedāstu viṃśatiḥ // Rajni_20.96
analyzed: caturthe ca ekaḥ iti ete trika bhedāḥ tu viṃśatiḥ

original: ādye tyakte tu pañca syuḥ svāgrimaikaikasaṃyute /
analyzed: ādye tyakte tu pañca syuḥ sva agrima eka eka saṃyute
catuṣka bhedāḥ iti ete kramāt pañcadaśā īritāḥ

original: ekaḥ sarvasamāsena vyāse ṣaḍiti sapta te // Rajni_20.99
analyzed: ekaḥ sarva samāsena vyāse ṣaṣ iti sapta te
evam triṣaṣṭiḥ ākhyātāḥ rasa bhedāḥ samāsatas

original: bṛṃhaṇaṃ puṣṭidaṃ poṣyamutkaṃ pīnatvadaṃ ca tat /

vīrya vṛddhi karam vṛṣyam vājīkaraṇa bīja kṛt

original: āpyāyanaṃ tarpaṇaṃ ca prīṇanaṃ toṣaṇaṃ ca tat /

original: niḥṣyandanam abhiṣyandi netradrāvaṃ saraṃ ca tat // Rajni_20.102

iti prakṛta bhiṣaj anukta āhāra pathya prayogam

original: imamakhilamuditvā vargamutsargasiddhān pravadatu sa ca vidvān āmayapratyayāṃs tān // Rajni_20.103

original: yena vyādhiśatāndhakārapaṭalīniṣkāsanābhāskaraprāyeṇāpi punastarāṃ pravihitā hanta dviṣāṃ vyādhayaḥ /
analyzed: yena vyādhi śata andhakāra paṭalī niṣkāsanā bhāskara prāyeṇa api punastarām pravihitāḥ hanta dviṣām vyādhayaḥ

original: tasyāyaṃ kṛtivāci viṃśatitamaḥ śrīmannṛsiṃheśituḥ śāntiṃ nāmakirīṭamaṇḍanamaṇau vargo gadādirgataḥ // Rajni_20.104
analyzed: tasya ayam kṛti vāci viṃśatitamaḥ śrīmat nṛsiṃha īśituḥ śāntim nāma kirīṭa maṇḍana maṇau vargaḥ gada ādiḥ gataḥ  /
rājanighaṇṭu
sattva ādi varga
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ ca iti puṃsām uktāḥ trayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: teṣu kramādamī doṣāḥ kaphapittānilāḥ sthitāḥ // Rajni_21.1

original: sattvaṃ śleṣmā rajaḥ pittaṃ tamaścāpi samīraṇaḥ /

original: sattvaṃ manovikāśaḥ syāt sattvāyattā tathā sthitiḥ // Rajni_21.3
analyzed: sattvam manaḥ vikāśaḥ syāt sattva āyattā tathā sthitiḥ

analyzed: sparśanaḥ gandhavāhī ca pavanaḥ marut āśugaḥ

original: ābhyantaraṃ ca bāhyaṃ ca svarūpaṃ saṃnirucyate // Rajni_21.10

original: sattvāḍhyaḥ śucirāstikaḥ sthiramatiḥ puṣṭāṅgako dhārmikaḥ kāntaḥ so 'pi bahuprajaḥ sumadhurakṣīrādibhojyapriyaḥ /
analyzed: sattva āḍhyaḥ śuciḥ āstikaḥ sthira matiḥ puṣṭa aṅgakaḥ dhārmikaḥ kāntaḥ saḥ u pi bahu prajaḥ sumadhura kṣīra ādi bhojya priyaḥ

original: dātā pātraguṇādṛto drutatamaṃ vāgmī kṛpāluḥ samo gauraḥ śyāmatanur ghanāmbutuhinasvapnekṣaṇaḥ śleṣmalaḥ // Rajni_21.11
analyzed: dātā pātra guṇa ādṛtaḥ drutatamam vāgmī kṛpāluḥ samaḥ gauraḥ śyāma tanuḥ ghana ambu tuhina svapna īkṣaṇaḥ śleṣmalaḥ  /

original: rājaso lavaṇāmlatiktakaṭukaprāyoṣṇabhojī paṭuḥ prauḍho nātikṛśo 'pyakālapalitī krodhaprapañcānvitaḥ /
analyzed: rājasaḥ lavaṇa amla tikta kaṭuka prāya uṣṇa bhojī paṭuḥ prauḍhaḥ na ati kṛśaḥ pi akāla palitī krodha prapañca anvitaḥ

original: drāghīyān mahilāśayo vitaritā sopādhikaṃ yācito gaurāṅgaḥ kanakādidīptilalitaḥ svapnī ca pittātmakaḥ // Rajni_21.12
analyzed: drāghīyān mahilā āśayaḥ vitaritā sopādhikam yācitaḥ gaura aṅgaḥ kanaka ādi dīpti lalitaḥ svapnī ca pitta ātmakaḥ

original: nidrālurbahubhāṣakaḥ sukuṭilaḥ krūrāśayo nāstikaḥ prāyaḥ paryuṣitātiśītavirasāhāraikaniṣṭho 'lasaḥ /
analyzed: nidrāluḥ bahu bhāṣakaḥ su kuṭilaḥ krūra āśayaḥ nāstikaḥ prāyas paryuṣita atiśīta virasa āhāra eka niṣṭhaḥ lasaḥ

original: kāryeṣvatyabhimānavān asamaye dātā yathecchaṃ kṛśaḥ svapne vyomagatiḥ sitetaratanur vātūlakas tāmasaḥ // Rajni_21.13
analyzed: kāryeṣu ati abhimānavān asamaye dātā yatheccham kṛśaḥ svapne vyoma gatiḥ sitetara tanuḥ vātūlakaḥ tāmasaḥ

original: sattvādayo guṇā yatra miśritāḥ santi bhūyasā /

original: āndhyaṃ hanta hṛdi prayacchati tirodhatte svatattve dhiyaṃ saṃdhatte jaḍatāṃ ca saṃtatam upādhatte pramīlāṃ tamaḥ // Rajni_21.16

original: vātaḥ svairaḥ syāllaghuḥ śītarūkṣaḥ sūkṣmasparśajñānakas todakārī /

original: pittaṃ ca tiktāmlarasaṃ ca sārakaṃ coṣṇaṃ dravaṃ tīkṣṇam idaṃ madhau bahu /

original: turyaṃ pādaṃ caturthāṃśam īṣat kiṃcit tathocyate // Rajni_21.30

original: śabdoccāre sakalaguruke ṣaṣṭivarṇapramāṇe mānaṃ kāle palamiti daśa syāt kṣaṇastāni taistu /

original: ṣaḍbhir nāḍī prahara iti tāḥ sapta sārdhās tathāhorātro jñeyaḥ sumatibhir asāv aṣṭabhistaiḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // Rajni_21.32

original: tribhis tribhiḥ kramādetaiḥ syātāṃ ca viṣuvāyane // Rajni_21.35
analyzed: tribhiḥ tribhiḥ kramāt etaiḥ syātām ca viṣuva ayane

original: palaṃ vighaṭikā proktā nāḍī tāstu triviṃśatiḥ /

original: vyuṣṭaṃ cāharmukhaṃ kalyaṃ prage prāhṇaṃ prabhātakam // Rajni_21.41

original: cāṅgerī likucāmlavetasayutaṃ jambīrakaṃ pūrakaṃ nāraṅgaṃ phalaṣāḍavastviti tu piṇḍāmlaṃ ca bījāmlakam /
analyzed: cāṅgerī likuca amlavetasa yutam jambīrakam pūrakam nāraṅgam phalaṣāḍavaḥ tu iti tu piṇḍāmlam ca bījāmlakam

original: ambaṣṭhāsahitaṃ dvir etaduditaṃ pañcāmlakaṃ taddvayaṃ vijñeyaṃ karamardanimbukayutaṃ syādamlavargāhvayam // Rajni_22.36
analyzed: ambaṣṭhā sahitam dvis etat uditam pañcāmlakam tat dvayam vijñeyam karamarda nimbuka yutam syāt amlavarga āhvayam
sarpa netra yutāḥ pañca siddhauṣadhika saṃjñakāḥ

original: śairīṣaṃ kusumaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ pattraṃ tvagityayam /
analyzed: śairīṣam kusumam mūlam phalam pattram tvac iti ayam
tvac pattra kusumam mūlam phalam ekasya śākhinaḥ

original: ekatra militaṃ taccet pañcāṅgamiti saṃjñitam // Rajni_22.39
analyzed: ekatra militam tat ced pañcāṅgam iti saṃjñitam

original: śvadaṃṣṭrā ceti samprokto yogaḥ pañcagaṇābhidhaḥ // Rajni_22.40
analyzed: śvadaṃṣṭrā ca iti samproktaḥ yogaḥ pañcagaṇa abhidhaḥ
proktaḥ bhavati yogaḥ yam pañcaśūraṇa saṃjñakaḥ
śṛṅgikaḥ kālakūṭaḥ ca mustakaḥ vatsanābhakaḥ
saktukaḥ ca iti yogaḥ yam mahā pañcaviṣa abhidhaḥ
etāni upaviṣāṇi āhuḥ pañca pāṇḍitya śālinaḥ

original: gavām ajānāṃ meṣīṇāṃ mahiṣīṇāṃ ca miśritam /
analyzed: gavām ajānām meṣīṇām mahiṣīṇām ca miśritam
mūtreṇa gardabhīnām yat tat mūtram mūtrapañcakam
suvarṇam rajatam tāmram trayam etat trilohakam
vaṅga nāga samāyuktam tat prāhuḥ pañcalohakam

original: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ trapu kṛṣṇāyasaṃ samam /
analyzed: suvarṇam rajatam tāmram trapu kṛṣṇāyasam samam
graha aṅgam iti boddhavyam dvitīyam pañcalohakam
yava muṣkaka sarjānām palāśa tilayoḥ tathā

original: kṣāraistu pañcabhiḥ proktaḥ pañcakṣārābhidho gaṇaḥ // Rajni_22.48
analyzed: kṣāraiḥ tu pañcabhiḥ proktaḥ pañcakṣāra abhidhaḥ gaṇaḥ
kāca saindhava sāmudra viḍa sauvarcalaiḥ samaiḥ
syāt pañcalavaṇam tat ca mṛtsnā upetam ṣaṣ āhvayam
dhava apāmārga kuṭaja lāṅgalī tila muṣka jaiḥ
kṣāraiḥ etaiḥ tu militaiḥ kṣāraṣaṭkam udāhṛtam
rasa asṛj māṃsa medaḥ sthi majjā śukra samāhvayaiḥ
śarīra sthairya daiḥ etaiḥ sapta dhātu mayaḥ gaṇaḥ
daradaḥ pāradam sasyaḥ vaikrāntam kāntam abhrakam

original: mākṣikaṃ vimalaṃ ceti syur ete'ṣṭau mahārasāḥ // Rajni_22.53
analyzed: mākṣikam vimalam ca iti syuḥ ete aṣṭau mahārasāḥ
śaileya añjana sammiśrāḥ śaṃsanti uparasān budhāḥ
kampilla gaurī capalā kaparda sa śaila sindūraka vahnijārān
pāṣāṇinaḥ vā udara śṛṅga yuktān iti aṣṭa sāmānyarasāni ca āhuḥ
pañcaloha samāyuktaiḥ kānta muṇḍaka tīkṣṇakaiḥ
kalpitaḥ kathitaḥ dhīraiḥ aṣṭaloha abhidhaḥ gaṇaḥ
mūtrāṇi hasti mahiṣa uṣṭra gavājakānām meṣa aśva rāsabhaka mānuṣa mānuṣīṇām

original: yatnena yatra militāni daśeti tāni śāstreṣu mūtradaśakāhvayabhāñji bhānti // Rajni_22.58
analyzed: yatnena yatra militāni daśa iti tāni śāstreṣu mūtra daśaka āhvaya bhāñji bhānti
syāt jīvaka ṛṣabhaka yugya yuga dvi medā kākolikā dvaya yuta dvika sūpyaparṇyā

original: jīvyā madhūkayutayā madhurāhvayo'yaṃ yogo mahāniha virājati jīvakādiḥ // Rajni_22.59
analyzed: jīvyā madhūka yutayā madhura āhvayā uyam yogaḥ mahān iha virājati jīvaka ādiḥ
jīvaka ṛṣabhakau mede kākolyau ṛddhi vṛddhike
ekatra militaiḥ etaiḥ aṣṭavargaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
kuṣṭha māṃsī haridrābhiḥ vacā śaileya candanaiḥ

original: ajājī maricaṃ śuṇṭhī granthi dhānyaṃ niśāhvayam /
pippalī maricaṃ ceti veśavāragaṇo mataḥ // Rajni_22.62

analyzed: sarva oṣadhi samāyuktāḥ śuṣkāḥ ca āmalaka tvacaḥ

original: yadā tadāyaṃ yogaḥ syāt sugandhāmalakābhidhaḥ // Rajni_22.63
analyzed: yadā tadā ayam yogaḥ syāt sugandhāmalaka abhidhaḥ
lājā cūrṇam sa madhu ājyam saṃtarpaṇam udāhṛtam
saktubhiḥ sarpiṣā abhyaktaiḥ śīta vāri pariplutaiḥ
na ati acchaḥ na ati sāndraḥ ca manthaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: dāḍimaṃ kiṃśukaṃ lākṣā bandhūkaṃ ca niśāhvayam /
analyzed: dāḍimam kiṃśukam lākṣā bandhūkam ca niśāhvayam
kusumbha puṣpam mañjiṣṭhā iti etaiḥ raktavargakaḥ
khaṭinī śveta saṃyuktāḥ śaṅkha śukti varāṭikāḥ
bhṛṣṭā aśmaśarkarā ca iti śuklavargaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
kirāta viśvendra kaṇa indra bīja dhānyāni tiktam suradārukam ca
aṣṭādaśa aṅga abhidhaḥ eṣa yogaḥ samāgame syāt daśamūlakena

original: dvidhā ca bhārgyādika eka eṣa jñeyo dvitīyastu kirātakādiḥ // Rajni_22.69
analyzed: dvidhā ca bhārgyādikaḥ ekaḥ eṣa jñeyaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu kirātaka ādiḥ

original: dvātriṃśatpalasammitaṃ dadhi palānyaṣṭau ca khaṇḍaṃ palasyārdhaṃ cenmaricasya tena tulitaṃ yuktaṃ tvagelāhvayam /
analyzed: dvātriṃśat pala sammitam dadhi palāni aṣṭau ca khaṇḍam palasya ardham ced maricasya tena tulitam yuktam tvac elā āhvayam

original: madhvājyaṃ ca yutaṃ tadardhamilitaṃ saṃśodhitair yojitā bhāṇḍe syāddhimavāsite śikhariṇī śrīkaṇṭhabhogyā guṇaiḥ // Rajni_22.70
analyzed: madhu ājyam ca yutam tad ardha militam saṃśodhitaiḥ yojitā bhāṇḍe syāt hima vāsite śikhariṇī śrīkaṇṭha bhogyā guṇaiḥ
ittham nānā miśra yoga abhidhānāt enam vargam miśraka ākhyam viditvā

original: vaidyaḥ kuryād yogam atratyasaṃjñāprajñāsaṃjño bandhubhiryena dhīraḥ // Rajni_22.71
analyzed: vaidyaḥ kuryāt yogam atratya saṃjñā prajñā saṃjñaḥ bandhubhiḥ yena dhīraḥ

original: śauryāsaṅgaratā ramā svayamumā śaśvacchivāsaṅginī sā vāṇī caturānanapraṇayinī śrīsammitā yaṃ śritā /
analyzed: śaurya asaṅga ratā ramā svayam umā śaśvat śiva āsaṅginī sā vāṇī caturānana praṇayinī śrī sammitā yam śritā

original: tasyāgād abhidhānaśekharamaṇau vargo nṛsiṃheśitur dvāviṃśo 'vasitiṃ kṛtau kṛtadhiyāṃ yo miśrakākhyo mataḥ // Rajni_22.72
analyzed: tasya agāt abhidhāna śekhara maṇau vargaḥ nṛsiṃha īśituḥ dvāviṃśaḥ vasitim kṛtau kṛta dhiyām yaḥ miśraka ākhyaḥ mataḥ
rājanighaṇṭu
ekārtha ādi varga
eka artha varga

original: śrīśca lakṣmīphale jñeyā tv asano bījavṛkṣakaḥ /
analyzed: śrīḥ ca lakṣmīphale jñeyā tu asanaḥ bījavṛkṣakaḥ

original: śālūkaṃ padmakande syāt sadāpuṣpo ravidrume // Rajni_23.1
analyzed: śālūkam padma kande syāt sadāpuṣpaḥ ravidrume

original: vallakī sallakīvṛkṣe mātuluṅge tu pūrakaḥ // Rajni_23.3
analyzed: vallakī sallakī vṛkṣe mātuluṅge tu pūrakaḥ
kavacaḥ syāt parpaṭake lavaṇam tu payodhijam

original: bṛhattvak saptaparṇe syātkāmbhojī vākucī tathā // Rajni_23.5
analyzed: bṛhattvac saptaparṇe syāt kāmbhojī vākucī tathā

original: vaikuṇṭham arjake prāhurbhūdhātryāṃ tu tamālinī // Rajni_23.6
analyzed: vaikuṇṭham arjake prāhuḥ bhūdhātryām tu tamālinī

original: śauṇḍī tu pippalī jñeyā kastūryāṃ madanī tathā /
analyzed: śauṇḍī tu pippalī jñeyā kastūryām madanī tathā

original: brahmaparṇī pṛśniparṇyāṃ citraparṇī ca sā smṛtā // Rajni_23.8
analyzed: brahmaparṇī pṛśniparṇyām citraparṇī ca sā smṛtā

original: śākaśreṣṭhastu vṛntāke śaṅgaraḥ śamir ucyate // Rajni_23.9
analyzed: śākaśreṣṭhaḥ tu vṛntāke śaṅgaraḥ śamiḥ ucyate

kapikacchuḥ ātmaguptā vātapothaḥ tu kiṃśuke

original: pītā tu rajanī jñeyā bodhivṛkṣastu pippalaḥ // Rajni_23.11
analyzed: pītā tu rajanī jñeyā bodhivṛkṣaḥ tu pippalaḥ
hiṅgau agūḍhagandhaḥ syāt godante visragandhike  /
śamyām īśānaḥ iti āhuḥ divā andhaḥ ghūkaḥ ucyate

original: rocanī nārikele ca bhūdhātryāṃ cāruhā smṛtā /

analyzed: priyām priyaṅguke prāhuḥ kharāhvā ca ajamodake
tagaram daṇḍahastī syāt rasonaḥ laśune smṛtaḥ

analyzed: jñeyam mātula puṣpam tu dhustūre corake ripuḥ

original: śaṣpaṃ bālatṛṇaṃ proktaṃ śaileyaṃ cāśmapuṣpake // Rajni_23.16
śrīpuṣpaṃ tu lavaṃge syādbālapuṣpī tu yūthikā /
analyzed: śrīpuṣpam tu lavaṃge syāt bālapuṣpī tu yūthikā

original: sthūlapuṣpaṃ tu jheṇḍūke citrake dāruṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_23.17
analyzed: sthūlapuṣpam tu jheṇḍūke citrake dāruṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
atha syāt viṣapuṣpam tu puṣpam śyāma dala anvitam

original: kaṇṭakāryāṃ tu śvetāyāṃ jñeyā tu kapaṭeśvarī // Rajni_23.20
analyzed: kaṇṭakāryām tu śvetāyām jñeyā tu kapaṭeśvarī

original: gāyatrī khadire proktā syād ervārustu karkaṭī // Rajni_23.21
analyzed: gāyatrī khadire proktā syāt ervāruḥ tu karkaṭī

original: spṛkkāyāṃ devaputrī syādaṅkole devadāru ca // Rajni_23.22
analyzed: spṛkkāyām devaputrī syāt aṅkole devadāru ca

original: rīṭhāṃ prakīryake prāhur dantyāṃ keśaruhā smṛtā /

original: āmrastu sahakāre syāt jñeyastāle drumeśvaraḥ // Rajni_23.23
analyzed: āmraḥ tu sahakāre syāt jñeyaḥ tāle drumeśvaraḥ

original: māciṣā maṇḍake proktā mārjārī mṛganābhijā // Rajni_23.24

original: makuṣṭo vanamudge syānmakuṣṭhe ca kṛmīlakaḥ // Rajni_23.31

original: vikaṅkato mṛduphale kesare bakulaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_23.33

analyzed: mṛduḥ kanyā tu samproktā jīvā syāt jīvake tathā

analyzed: kṛṣṇam nīlāñjane prāhuḥ ākhukarṇī tu śambarī

original: apāmārgo 'tha raktā tu mañjiṣṭhāyāṃ śaṭastathā // Rajni_23.39

original: dhustūre brahmajā brāhmī gandharvaḥ kokile smṛtaḥ /

analyzed: saraṭī tu durārohā bāhulyām tarvaṭaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: brahmaputrī tu bhārgī syāddhastiparṇī tu karkaṭī /

analyzed: tulasī bahumañjaryām kaṭabhyām gardabhī smṛtā
